item.text: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun
don drug pa/// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med pa'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa
pa'i phyir byang chub sems da migs so// sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las
kla// nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dban
pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig/
so sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir bang chub sems dpa' phyima'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
bang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig
so sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi pher byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir bud
chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sa khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su me
dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med pa dang/ sa'i khams stong pa
nyid dang/ sa'i khams dben pa dang/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
mi dmigs/ dbus mdamigs te/ sa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i
khams dban pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
de ltar na sa'i khams mad pa gang yin pa dang/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ sa'i khams dban pa gang yin pa dang/ sa'i
ngams ngo bo nyeng med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpar gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang
na/ yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis sumed de gnyis su bar med de// tshodang ldan pa sha 'dra le'u/ chu khamasamad pa'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' sngon gyi mtha'i
dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyi byang chub sems dang 'a sngon gyi thar mi dmigasaso// nulekhams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa 'a po byang chub sams dang 'asngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i bams med pa'i bya byang chub sems dang 'a poma'amatha ma dmigasaso// chu'i khams stongang
nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' phyin mthar mi dmigasaso// chu'i khams dban pa'i phyir byang chub sam dang dang phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs sa// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi de byang chub
sams dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs sa// nu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'dabusasumadamigasas// nu'i khamasastong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa 'dabus su tshigs
dmigs so// chu'i khams dbenanga'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'dabus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi'i byung chub sems dba' dbus su dmigs so// daci'i
phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan ngashAdAti'ibu/ chu'i khams med pa dang/ chu khams stong pa nyid dang/ chu'i khamasadapon pa dang/ chu'i khams ngo bonyid med pal/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chu'i khams med pa yang gzhan m yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gazhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa ya nga/
gzhan m ir/ chu'i khams ngobo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dang 'ayang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ byama'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan ng shA ra dwa ti'u/ de ltar na chu khams med pa gangayin pa dang/ chu khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ chu'i khams dban pa gang yin pa dang/ chu khasu
nga po nyid mdang gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mthartagang yin pa dang/ phyima'i mthul g.yig ba dang/ dbusagang nub de dag thams cad kyang
gnyis su mad de gnyis s byar med do// cho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang da sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthu mi dmigasaso// mi las dbananga'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'a sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// ma'i khams ngo bonyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i
sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// me khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i maMthar mi dmigasaso// me'i khams stongang nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' phyima'i mthar mi dmag
so nyamagikhams dben pa'i bu byang chub sems dpa ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasas// ma' khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phung byang chub sams dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dgos so// ma'i/
khams med pa'i phyir byang chubs sa dpal dus su mi dmigasaso// ma'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs so/ me khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sa
dba'adabus su mdamagasaso/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi byang chub sems dang 'dabus sum dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhun/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu makyikhams med pa dang/
ma'i khams stong nga nyid dang/ merI mas dben pa dang/ ma khams ngo bo nyid med pa la// sngon gyi mkhrar ma dmigs// phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mi'i
khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma'ikhams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams dban pa yang gzhan ma yin me'i khams du be nyidi med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyimatha' yang gzhan ma yini/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan la yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin na// tshodang ldan pa shar dwa ti'ilu/ de ltar
nama'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang/ me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang/ ma'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub
sems dang gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus ga yin pa de dag thams cad kyi gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med/

de tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasas// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
rlung gi khams dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mtha mi dmigasaso// rlung gi khams nga bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// rlung gi khams
med pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs sa/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs su// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mir gsas// rlung gi khams nga banyide med pa'i phyir bung chupa sems dpa' phyi ma'i mgrar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' dbusasum dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang 'dabusasum dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyirang chub sems dpa' dbus su midamigs
so/rung gikhams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus sum dmigs so// dmi'aphyir na/ tshe dang ljon pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams med pa dang/ rlung gi khams ]
stong pa nyid dang/ rlung gi khams dben pa dang/ rlung gi khams ngabonyidi med pa la// sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rlung gi khams med/
pa yang gazhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dban pa yang gzhan pa yin/ rlung gi khams ngob 'di med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang nubasams dang 'a
yang gzhan m yin/ sngon gyematha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyema'i mthar yang gazhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma nin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ deltar narlung gi khams med pa gang yin
pa dang/ rlung gi khams stodapa nyid gang yin pa dang/ rlung gikhams dban pa gang yin b dang/ rlung gi khams ngobo 'demad pa gangayin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi
mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyimabimatha' gang yin pa dang/ dbusagang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su medadaganyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa kA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams
med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phu byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dban pa'i
phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngonagyi mthar mi dmigasaso// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyimathar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med pa'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang la phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i/
khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sa ma sa dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'uphyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' yi dmags so// nam mkha'i kham
med pa'i phyir byang chub samos dba' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigasas// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'iphyir/
byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu mi dmigs so// nam mkha'akhams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi'i byang chub soms dpo'idabus su mi dmigs so// datsa'i phyir zhin/ tshodang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/
nam mkha'i khamasamadapa dang/ nam mkha'i khams stong nyid dang/ nam mkha'akhams dban pa dang/ nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid med palasngon gyi mtha' midamigs/ phyema'i mtha' mi
dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nam mkha'i khams med payogazhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma
yin nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyidmadapa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub soms dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mthatsayang gzhan ma yin/ phyima'amathar yang gzhan ma yin/
dbus kyang gashan ma yin na// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa 'bu/ de ltar na nam mkhakyikhams med pa gang yin pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams
dban pa gang yin pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyidamed pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyima'i mtha'agayin pa dang/ dbus
gang yin pa dudag thams cad kyaganyis su med gnyis su bya mdado// tshod ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa 'iphyir byang chub sems dpa' sngonagyi mthar mi dmigs//
rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub samasadapa' ston gyi mthar ma dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dban pa phyi de byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmig
sa[;] rnam par shes pa 'khalas ngo 'di mdang 'phyo'i byang chub sems dpa' sngonagyi mthar mi dmigasaso// rnam pa shes pa'i khams mad pa'i phyir byang chubs mas dpal phyi ma'i mthAr
ma dmigs so// rnam par shas nga khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mgramAmi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
mthar mi dmigasaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dba'
dbus su dmigasaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dabus su mi dmigasas// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang
la chungasams dba' dbus su mdamig/sa so// rnam par shes pa'i ms ngo bo nyid med pa7re byang chub sems dba' dbus sumadamigasaso// ci bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam bshas pa'i khams med ba dang/ rnam pa shes pa'i khams stong ba nyid dang/ rnam bshesapagikhams dban dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyidamed pal/ sngon gyimatha'atsho
dmigs/ phyi me'imathu'amadamigs/ dbus mi dmigs/ rnam par shesaba'akhamag med pa yang gazhan mayin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam
bangashas nga gi khams dbanang yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang nubasomasadapalang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mthalagazhan
ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthar yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa'i r dwa ti'ibu/ dalan rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang/ rnam pas
pa'i khams stong nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dbon pa gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngobo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thaman kyang gnyis su med dganyis su byar medad// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i/
bu ma rig pa mdaba'i phyire byang chub sams dang 'asngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi po de byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// ma'ag pa dbanapa'i phyi'i byang
chub samasadapa'i sngon gyi mthamadamigasaso// marig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyire byang chub sems dbang sngon gyamathar midamigasaso// ma rig pa med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dba' phyi ma'i
mthamidamigasaso// ma rigapa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byungachub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar maM dmigasas// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang nubasams dpa' phyoma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma
'gi kha ngo bonyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma 'ge ba med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa 'dabusasumadamigasas// ma'og pa stongang nyid kyi phyir byang
chub sems dpa' dbusasu tshudamigs so// ma rig pa dbanapa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus sumi dmigs so// ma rig pango bo nyid med pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' dbusasu'i
dmigasaso// detsi'i phyi zhen/ tshodang ldan pa shar dwa ti'u/ ma rig bag med pa dang/ ma rige ba stongapa nyidadang/ ma rig pa dbenang dang/ ma rig pangonyidimed ngal/ sngon gyi mtha'ami
Na @#// dmigs/ phyi ma'imakhra'amadamags/ dbus mdamigs te/ mjig pa med pa yang gzhan mayin/ marlag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mgi bdabang yang gzhan m/
cha mi/ rta mgi khangacademedalangagazhanam yin/ byungachub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' langagazhan ma yin/ me'i mtha'ayang gazhanamalani/ dbus kyang gazhan ma

mnano/[… ]tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwati'ikhu/ ltagan ma rig pa med pa gangalane pa dang/ ma rige ba stong pa nyid gangayanepa dang/ marig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyidmadapagangain
pa dang/ byang chub samasadapa'i gayin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha'agang yin pa dang/ ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa dang gathams cad kyang gnyis su med dganyisasu
byamadang// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed med pa'i sbyor byang chub sems dba'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasas// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
midamigasago/ 'du byed dabanaba'i phyi byang nubasanas dba' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasas// 'du byed po nyid med parebyang chub samasadapa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
'du byed tshadapa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthadamigasaso// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed daben pa'i khyor/
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthachadamigasaso// 'du byed po de med pa'i byang chub sems dba' ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'dabus/
su mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'idabus su mo dmagosaso// 'du byed dabenaba'i khyi byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmagos so/ 'du byed ngo
bonyid medaba'i 'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su lo dmigasaso// de ci'i phyir na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i[é ]/'du byed med pa dang/ 'du byed stong pa nyid dang/ 'du khyadadaben ba
dang 'du khyadangabo nyidemed pal/ sngonatshamatha'atsho dmigs/ phyi'imatha' mi dmogs/ dbusami dmigs te/ 'du byad med pa yang gzhan m yin/ 'du byed stongapa nyidakyang gazhanam
min[5 ]'du byed daben pas gzhan ma yin/ 'du byedungo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dang 'a yang gazhanam yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gazhanamayin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
yang gazhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gazhanam yin// tshod ldan bashar b ti'u/ de ltar 'du byed med pa gang yazhi pa dang/ 'du byed stongapa nyidegang yin pa dang/ 'du byed na ba gang yin
pa dang/ 'du byed ngo bonyidimed pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyimatha'agayin pa dang/ phyi ma'ima'agang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa dedag thams
cad kyang gnyis su med gnyis su byamed// dab ldan ng pa pa tA'i/ rnam bshis ba med pa'i myong byang chub sag dang 'a sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// rnam/
bar ngashasapa stong nyid kyi bya bsags pa sngon gyi khrachidamigs so// rnam shes pa dbenapa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyimatharatshudamigasaso// rnam par shes pa ngo
demed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyim thami dmigasaso/ rnam bar 'os pa med paphyire byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'amathar dmigasaso// rnam par shes pa stong ba nyid kyi
tsha phyir byang chub sems dba'i phyi mtha'adimibs so/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha'am dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngobanyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
sams dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' dabusasum dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa'
@# dbus su mdamigasaso// rnam par shes ba dben pa'i ladabyang chub sems dpa' dabus su'i dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyidamed pa'i phyirebyang chub sems dba'adabusasu mi
jamagasaso// de'i phyi zhe na/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam bangashes pa med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ rnam pa shes pa dbon pa dang/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo
nyid med pal/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam ba shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan m ya/
rnam brtags pa dban ba yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa de nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yani/ byang chub samasadang 'a ya gzhan ma yin/sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma mtha' yang
gzhan m yin/ dbus kyang gazhanam yin no/ tshe dang ldan ng 'dra ti'ibu/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa
dban pa gdwayin pa dang/ rnamapa rashes pa dro bcud med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyia'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus
grang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su medadaganyisas byar med do// tshod ldan pa/ra dwa ti'i bu/ ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso/
ming dang gzugs stong pa nyidakyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha mi dmigs so// ming dang
gzags ngo bo nying ba'i lor byang chub sems daba'asngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chu
stong pa nyid kyi phyi bang zhusams dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// ming dang gzugs/
ngo bo nyidmed por byang chub samasadapa 'byin mthar mi dmigs so// ming dngagazugs med pa'i phyir byang chusamasadapadabus su mi dmigasas// mi dngagazugasastong ba nyid kyi
phyi byang chub sems dpa' dbusasum mgasas// ming dang gzugs dbanapatshu byang chub sems dpa' dabus su mdamigasaso// mi dgazugasang ba nyidi med pa'i phyi'i byang nubasams
dpa' dabus su mi dmigs so// datso'akhyibazhin/ dang ldan ng radAti'i khu/ mdzad ngagazugs med padwang/ mingadagazugasastong nyid dang/ mongadangagazugs dbon bdang/ ming

pa stong pa nyid kyi khye'u byang chub sems dpa' phyis mthar mi dmigasaso// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasas// rig pa ngo bonyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
sams dbal phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dang 'dabus su ma dmigs so// rig pa stongapa nyid kyi phyir byang nubasems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so/

pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong

wa/ nyidadabanapa'i phurabyang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'imathar mi dmigasaso// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyidemed pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasas// stong pa nyidastong ba//
nyid medaba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasum dmigosaso// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i
phyir byang chub samasadapa'idabus su midamigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo nyid med pa'i phyir byang nubasams pa'i dabus su mi dmigs so// daci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan shA ra dwa

ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyidamed pa dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong nyid dang/ stong nyid stong pa nyid dpanapa dang/ stongapa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pal/sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stongabanyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stongapa nyid stongapa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong panyid dben
yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bonyidamad pa yang gzhan yune/ byang nubasams dpa' lang gzhan m yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gazhanam yin/ phyi ma'i mthu'aang
gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gazhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan ng[“]shar dwa ti'u/ daltar na stong nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ stong pa nyid stongapa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/

yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis sumed de gnyis sa byaramedade// tshodang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen postongapanyid med pa phyir

byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyis thal gdamagiso// chen po stongapa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub samasadaba'asngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// chen po stong pa nyid ngapo de med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// chen postong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

gi dmigasaso// chanab stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// dzinapo stongapa nyid dbenupa'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' phyi ma'i lo thar mi dmigs//
chen postong pa nyid ngapo de med pa 'phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mdamigs so// chen b stong
pa nyid stongang nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dabus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dabusasu mi dmigs so// chen bo stong banyidango bo nyid/

[j]med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dba' dbus su mi dmigs so// ci'i phyi zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa gar dA'akhu/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyin//
dban pa dang/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med la/ sngon gyi mtha' mdamigs/ ma'i mtha' midamigs/ dbus midamigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid midapa yang gzhan ma yin/ chenubo
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dban pa yang gazhanam yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngogo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' mngagazhan cha yin/
sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'amathub ya ngagazhanAm na/ dbus kyang gazhan ma yin no// tshod ldan pa shAr dwa ti'u/ daltagan chen bo stong pa nyid med pa g.yin pa dang/

chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyide gang yin pa dang/ chen po stongapa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo 'di med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon
gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yane pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byung med de/ tshodang ldan bshA ra dwati'i'u/ don dam ba
stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa
stong pa nyid dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam ba stong pa nyid ngo bonyidimed pa'iphyi'i byang chub sems dapa' ston gyi mtha'am dmigs//
[«]2 so don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' phyima'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
don dam pa stongapanyid dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpar phyima'i mtha mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su mi dmigasaso// don dam pa stongapa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigasaso// donadzum pa
stongapanyid dbanapa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stongang nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigasaso// de phyirazhan/

N+NaM tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong panyid dban pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de nyid med pa la/
sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'ami dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// donadam ba stong pad med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ den dam pa stong nyid stong pa nyid kyang gazhanam in
don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ donadam pa stong nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpalayagazhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gazhan ma/
yin phyi ma'i mthaangagazhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin na// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar nadon dam pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa
nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyidadaban pa gang yin pa dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang nubasamasadapalag bayin pa dang/ sngon
gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha'agang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ganyis su medade gnyasas byar med do// tshodang ldan pa shar nAti'i bu/ 'dus
byas stongang nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// 'dus byas stong nyidastong pa nyid kyi phyir byung chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// 'dus
byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dba' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// 'dus byas stong nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// 'dus
byas stong ba nyid med pa'i phyi byang nub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyare bya nubasems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
'dus byas stongapa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'amathar/ lasabya stegs
mi dmigasaso// 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasum dmigasas// 'dus byas stong nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
'dus byas stong pa nyid dbon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu mi dmigasaso// 'dus byas stongapa nyid ngo nyidi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// deci'i

tsho phyipazhin/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stongapa nyid med pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo
'od med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong ba nyid stong pa

gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus byas stongapa nyid med pa gang yin pa

so/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid duban paphyir byang chub sems dpa' dzin gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi

mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stongapa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigasas// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sams dpatshadabus
su mi dmigasaso// 'dus ma byas stong nyid dban pa'i phyi byang nubasems dpa' dbus su mi dmigasaso// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems/
dpa' dbusasumi dmigasaso// daci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/
dban dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngobo nyid med pal/ sngon gyi mtha' modamigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan
tshem yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gazhan yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dban pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
sams dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gazhan ma yin/ ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa
gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
gnyis su byar med de// tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ mthAlas 'dus pa stong nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems duba' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// mthaba'as 'das pa stong pa/
nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha mi dmigasas// mtha'alas 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mthalas
'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// mthalas 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mdamig+ha
so[5 ]mtha' las 'das pa stong panyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stongapa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med 'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' phyi ma'imathar mi dmigs so// mthalas 'das pa stong banyid med pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyidastong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
de dban ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigasaso// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngobo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu mi dmigs so// de ci'i
phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid med pa dang/ mtha' las 'dus ba stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dung/ ma las 'das pa stong/
pa rnyed dban pa dang/ mthAlas 'as pastong panyid ngo bo nyid med pa// sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'ame tha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar las 'das pa stong pa nyid stongang nyid kyang gazhanam yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stongapa nyidadaban pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa3ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' mngagazhan ma an phyi ma'i mtha'o yi gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//

tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibu/ de ltar na mtha2las rwangs pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang mtha' 'as 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa de gang yin pa dang/ mtha'awa'adas pa stong pa nyid dban
tshe pa gang yin pa dang/ mtha' las 'das pas nag ba/da ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gas su med de gsas bya mad do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med ba'i phyi'i byang nubasams

dba' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyi'i
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasas// thagam dang tha ma medu pastong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'iphyir byang chub sems dba'asngon gyimathami dmigs so// thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa
nyidi med ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyidikyi phyi'i byang nubasams dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasago/ thog ma dang

tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig
so thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'od bus su mi dmigs so// thag ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong panyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dubus su mi
dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid stongabadadang/

mi dmigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thogam dang tham med pa stong pa nyid stong nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyidadaban pa yang gzhan
mayin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang nubasams dpa' yang gazhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mthar yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gazhan ma

yin dbus kyang gazhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwati'i/ de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma mad pastong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang

pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa/ sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmanges/ dbus ma dmigs te/ dor ba med pa stongapa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin//
tsha/ @#// dor bamed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gazhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dban pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gazhan ma/
yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan mayani/ sngon gyi mtha2yang gazhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti/
bu / daltar na dor bamed pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyidagang yin pa dang/ dorab med pa stong ba nyid dben pagang yin pa dang/ dor ba me dang
stong pa nyidango bo de med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha'agang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dgathams cad/
kyang gnyis su med dganyis su bya med do// cho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs sa// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyidu dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong ba nyid ngo bo
nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i rabyang chub dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
phyir byang chubs mas dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' midamigs so// rang bzhin stong panyid dban pa'i phyir bung rkubasams dba' phyi ma'imathar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong ba nyid stong ba nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems
dba'i dbus su mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong panyid dben pa'i phyire byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dabus
su ma dmigasaso// de'i phyilozhin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang/ rang bzhin stong panyid stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang/ rang
bzhin stong ba nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyim thab mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' midamigs/ dbus mi dmigs// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong

dpa' dbusasu mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshadapaldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ibu/ yang dag par song ba chod pa dang/ yang dag par songabastod canyid dang/ yang dag par song ba
ka @#// dben pa dang/ yang dag bar sbyong ba ngo bo nyid med la/ sngon gyi mtha'achi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus ma dmigs te// yang dag par spong
ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par song ba stong pa nyid kyagazhanam yin/ yang dag khar sbyong ba dbenapa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par sbyong ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma
yin/ byang chub sems dpa yagazhanam yin/ sngon gyi mthar yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan la yin no// tshodang ldan pa shA 'dwa ti'i
bu daltar yang dag par spong ba med pa gang yin pa dang/ yang dag par spong bstong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dban pa gang yin pa dang/ yang dag par song ba ngo bo
nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su

N+NaM med dganyis su byar med do// tshodang ldan pa shar dwa ti'ibu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med bgyi'i byang nubasamasadaba'asngon gyi mthar mi dmigasas// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa de kyi phyir
byang nubasoms dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dbon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyidmed pa'i phyir byang

(chub sams dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'imathar mi dmigasaso// rje 'phrulakyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems/
dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' phyoma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir byang nubasams dba'adabus su mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pastong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sams dpa' dbus
su midamigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dba'adabus su ma dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o dbus su mi

dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhan/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa dang/ rdzu 'bra'ogyi rkang stong pa nyid dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dbenapa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkangapa ngo bo nyid med nga la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs taM/ rdza'aphrul gyi rkang pa med pa yongagazhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa yang gzhan m yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa yangogazhanam yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/

rkang pa med pa gang yin pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang//

med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po med pa'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' sngon gyi mthar m dmigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi many+dzar
mi dmigasas// dbang padaban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtho mi dmigs so// dbang po btsademed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// dbang
po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'imathar mi dmigasas// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub samasadapa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir byung
pa sems dpa'i phyoma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dbang bo ngo ba nyidemed pa'i spyi byang chub sams dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso// dbang po med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus
chag/su mi dmigasaso/ dbang po stongapa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sams dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// dbang bo dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dba' dbus su midamigs so// dbang po tsho/
nyid med pa'i byang chub se mas dpadabus su mi dmigasaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po med pa dang/ dbang po stong pa nyid dang/ dbang bo dben//
ba dang/ dbang pos ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mthu'amidamigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ dbang po med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dbang bo stong pa nyid

sum dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dabus su ma dmigasaso// byang chub kyi yan lag dban ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'/

mi dmigasas// rang sangs rgyas stong nyid kyi phyir byang chub sams dpa' sngon gyi mthar mdamigasaso// rang sangs rgyas dubanang phyir byang chub sams dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
so rangasas rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs

rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mingamigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang dbus su mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyide
med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dabusasum dmigs so// da ci'i phyogazhan/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'ibu/ rang sangs rgyas med pa dang/ rangasangs//
rgyus stong pa nyid dang/ yang sangs rgyas dbonapa dang/ rasangs rgyas ngeganyid med pal/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'achangamigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rang

byang chub kyi yan lag kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par sgrig par bya'o// g.yapa'i di skad du ci'i phyi na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyud pa kun tu mthayas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshodang ldan pa/ ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phakas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pani nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dpar na/ nam mkhan sngon gyi mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
mtha' yas kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mang du brjod do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'phags palam yan lag brgyud pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'athagaM
ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'isngonakyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' midamigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stopa nyid la mthala'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshodapaldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang
rgyu// 'di skad duci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i bdenang kun tu mthas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatharayas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa/
ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams ni nam mkhar dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dpangan/ nam mkha'al ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
mkha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkhazhes ming du brjod do// tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'phags
ba'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'a'am
dbus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shar dwa tile'u/ rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'ibadon pa kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par
bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ bsam gtan kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ bsam gtan rnams ri nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di rangapachan/ nam mkhakal ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig/
dbus mi dmigs te/ mthar yas kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha'azhes ming du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyi bsam
gtan rnams kyisngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'am dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// stong pa nyid la mtha'a'amadabus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam gras des na bsam gtan kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumashams par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad duci'i phyir na/ tshad med pa kun tu mtha' yas
pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zerab ni/ tshodang ldan pa pa padwa ti'i bu/ tshad med pa rnams ni nam mkha'adang mnyamapa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
dpalan/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mah+phal sa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod
do rtatshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshad med pa stongapa nyid kyi phyir tshad med pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mthalami dmigs/ phyima'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te//
stong ba nyidil mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pad+d+hagar dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangasades na tshang med pa kun lcamatha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du rtsi'i thin/ gzugs med pa snyams pa'i jug pa kun tumany+dza' yus pa'i phyir byang chub sems dupa kun tumatha' yas par//

ga par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir zhe na/ 'dit+taradang mnyamamakha' ni ston gyi mtha'/
mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjong do// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu//
dbazhin du gzugs med pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi ma ya'i mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmig
tu / stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigasaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs med pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
tshe sams dba' kun tumasnga' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par tharapa brgyad kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sams dang la kun tu mtha' yas par
rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshodang ldan pa shA padwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams ninam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyi na/ 'di ltar dpar na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon
0/gyi mthal dmigs/ khyim mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha'o yus pa'i phyir nam mkhabazhes ming du brjod do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bu de bzhin ngu rnam par thar pa stong ba nyid kyi phyi rnam par thar pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'am dmigs/ phyima'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyidal mtha'
'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs desan rnam par thar pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par
bya'o[;]gang yapa'i di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa dag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyi'i byung chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par bya zhes
zer banaM/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha'adang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta dbar na/ nam
mkha' ni sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkhar zhes ming dubarjod do// tsho dang
ldan ba kA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbazhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'isnyoms par 'jug bstong pa nyid kyi phyi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
bya// khyima'i mtha'ami dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ma thaga'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
tsha dgon mthar gyis gnas pa'isoms papa'i jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ban/ tshodang
ldan bgar dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ rtson pa med pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dpar
na nam mkha'al ni sngon gyi ma brang midamigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mi dmigs/ dbus midamigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod
T+Tha dro tsho dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ dbazhin du rnam par tharapa'i sgo stongapanyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs ti/ stong pa nyid la mtha'a'am dbus mi/
dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa bar dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs desan rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' mas par rig par bya'o/ gang yang 'di skad duci'i phyir na/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
yas pa rig par bya zhes zor ba ni/ tshodang ldan bshar dwa ti'i bu/ mngon pa shes pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta dpar na/ nam
ma kha'al ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyi nam mkha'os ming du brjod do/
tshe dang ldan bshA ra dwa ti'i ba/ dbazhin ngu mngon par shes ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sngon gyimatha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
dmigs te// stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan nga' radA ti'abu/ rnamagrangs des na mngon pa shes pa kun tu mtha'ayas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpang kun tu mtha' yas pa rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad duci'i phyir na/ ting 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes
ba/ @#/ khro ban/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha'adang mnyam pa ste/ deci zhen/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' lani sngon gyi/
ma mtha'am dmigs/ phyi ma'il tshidamigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// mtha' yas kun tumany+dza'aas ba'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do// tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i
bu de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin stong nyid kyi phyi ting 'dzin rnams kyi sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyima'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbusami dmigs te/ stong nyidalamathare'am dbus
mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan b pa radwa ti'il/ rnam grangs de na ting nge 'dzin kun tumatsa' skabashigyi byang chub sems dba' kun tumathayas pajig par bya'o g.yang 'di skad
duci'i phyin/ gzungs kyi sgo kutumatha' yas pa'iphyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas kha rig pa byazhes zer pa ni/ tshe dang ldan par dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnamA
zhwa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ ba'i phyi bzhin/ 'di ltamadapangan/ nam mkhanisngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
mtha' ma kun tumatha' yas pa'i nam mkhagazhes ming dubarjod do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'ikhu/ de bzhin du gzus kyi sgo stong ba nyid kyi phyi rogazus kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi
mthalami dmigs/ lamathar mi dmigs/ dbusami dmigs te// stong ba nyidamatha'a'amadabus mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
gzus kyi kun tu mthams pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumashams pajig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du pa'iphyin/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha'/
mas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpakun tu mtha' yas bar rig par bya zhes zer bani/ tshe dang ldan b ra dwa ti'ibu/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobasa rnams ni nam mkha'adang mnyam pa ste/
deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltadapan/ nam mkhal ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyima'imathu mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun t+tamatha' yas
ba'i phyir nam mkha'azhes mi dubarjod do// tshod ldan panar dwa ti'u/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi
mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'ami dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong banyil mthala'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ rnam gras
des na de bzhin gshegs pa'istobs kun tumatha'ams pa'i phyir byang chusems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig pa bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mi 'jigs pa
kun tu mthayasapa'i byang chub samasadabadun tu thams par gapar bya zhes zebani/ tshod ldan paradwa ti'u/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ninam mkha'
ma dmanyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar dpan/ nam mkhani sngon gyi mtha'amedasogs/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// mtha' yas
kun zhumatha' yas pa'i phyi nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do// tshod ldan pa shA dA tile'u/ dbazhin du mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi'ajigs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig
phyi ma'i mtha'agi dmigs/ dbus midamigs te/ stong pa nyidal mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa 'a ra dwa ti'i/ rnam grangasades na mi 'jigs pa kun tu
mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa kun tumatha'ayas bar rig par bya'o// gang ya'adi skad du ci'i phyin/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tumatharayas pa'i phyir byang chub
sams dpa' kun tumatha' yas pa rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshad ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang drag pasngarig pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha'al ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyima'i thal mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// mtha' yas kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyi nam mkha'azhes
ming du brjod do// tshodang ldan yagar dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa stong nyid kyi phyi soso yang dag par rig pa rnams sngon gyi mtha' mdamigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mdamigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des naso so yang dag par rdzogapa
kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas bar thig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ snying rjechen po kun tumakha' yas pa'i phyi byang
chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rjer na bo ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ deci'i phyir zhen/ 'di/
ltar dparan/ nam mkhal ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tumatharams ba'i byin m/
mkha' zhes ming du brjod do// tshod ldan ng ba radwa tili'u/ dbazhin dusnying rje chen po stong pa nyidakyi phyir snying chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyema'i mtha'atshadAmig
dbusami dmigs te// stong nyid la mtha'a'os dbus mi dmigs so// tshod ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na snying rjecan po kun tumathayas pa'i phyir l]
byang chub sems dbakun tumatha' yas pa 'ag par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ni'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas
pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas ba'agog par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa radwa ta'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ninam mkha' dang
mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyin/ 'di ltar dpan/ nam ma khal ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha'
mas kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkhar zhes ming dubarjod do// tshod ldan pa shA dwa ti'ibu/ dbazhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngonakyi mtha'am demigs/ phyisa'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs ti/ stong pa nyid mthala'am dbus mi dmigs so//
tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des nas nigs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tumatha'ayas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig par bya'o//
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yapa'i di skad dutsa'i phyican/ gzugs byung tshubasams dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs/ tshor ba byung
chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs/ 'dushes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs/ 'du byed byang chub sems//
dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dramigs/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sams dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba ni/ tshodang ldan pa/
ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ ci'i phyizhin/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ byang chub sems dpa' medudo// tshodang ldan pa ra dwa ti'ibu/
rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpalazhis byab de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba'i tshor bosastong ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na stong pa nyid la tshor ba med
byung chub sems dpa' med do// tshod bldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshorab byang chub sems drapa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang mecing mi dmigs so// 'du
shesano 'du shes kyis stongs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyidu 'du shes med/ byang chub sems dpa' medudo// tshudapaldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na'adushis byang chub sems dpa' zhis bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so// 'du byed ro 'dubyed kyis stong ste/ datsa'i phyizhi na/ stong ba nyid la 'du byed med/
byang chub samasadapa'i med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du byed byang chub sems dabal zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs
so rnam pa shes pa ni rnam par shes pasastong ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la rnam par shes pa med/ byang chub sags dba'amed do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing ma dmigasaso// tshodang ldan pa lam dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
bani sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid sbyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming de// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
duphyin pa nitshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de'i phyir zhun/ stong pa nyid la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' meng de// bzod pa'i
ba rol tu phyin pa nibarjod pa'i pha rol tubyin bas stong ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin b med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ brtson
'grus kyi pha phol tuphyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong sto/ dari'i phyirezhen/ stong pa nyid la brtsono'agrus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems
dba'amed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi lasol tu phyin pas skyo ste/ mi'i khyi zhen/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med//
byung chub sems dpa' med do// shes ba kyi pha rol tubyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bs song ste/ de'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la shesarab kyis rol tu phyin pa
med byang chub sems dpa' me dado// tshodabaldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nang stong nyid ninang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ draci'iphyir zhe na/ stong pa
nyid la nAng song ngod med byang chub sems drab 'amad do//'o/ phyi stong ba nyid ni phyi stong ba nyid kyis stong cu/[”]ci'i phyir zhan/ stong ba nyid la tshe stong pa nyid med/
byang chub sems dang 'a med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stongs/ daci'iphyin/ stong pa nyidal phyin stong pa nyid med/ byang nubasams dpa'
medado// stong panyidAstong pa nyid ni stong ba nyid stong ba nyid kyis stong ste/ dba'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid la stong nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med
do chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stongang nying kyis stong ste/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid rtsa chen po stong pa nyid med/ byang chub soms dpa' med do// donadam
bu stong pa nyid ni nadam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ ci'iphyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sams dba'amed de//
'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med de//
'dus ma byas stong pa nyidan 'dusam byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stongapa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/
mthalalas 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ deci'i phyir zhin/ stong pa nyid la mthar las 'das pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa song pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
nyid med/ byang chub samasadapa' med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nidarab ched pa stong nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis sto[W ]3 ci'i phyir zhen/ stong nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid
meng byang chub ms dang me dade// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams nad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong
panyid med byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong panyid kyis stong ste/ de'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyidal
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sams dpa' med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ dan+ti'i phyir zhe na//
stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa sta patod med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ ngob nyidi stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
stong pa nyida' ngo bo nyid stong panyid med byang chub sems dpa' med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/
da ci'i phyir zhe na/ stongapa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sams dbang med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang dran ]
dpa nyapar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dranapa nyabar gzhag pa rnams med/ byang chub
sams dpa' med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ stongapa nyid la yang dag par song ba rnams med//
byang chub sams dang 'amed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir shin stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/
byang chub sam sa dba' med do// dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa'
med do// stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stongapadra la stobs rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med byang chub sems dpa' med do//
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ mi'i phyir don/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i yom yan lag brgyad pa med/
byang chub sems dpa' med do// 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams ni'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'ibadenapa/
rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' medado// bsam gtan rnams nibasam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams med/ byang
chub sems dpa' mid do// tshad med pa rnams ni chod medape rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid khatshang ma pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med
do[$]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par shrarapa brgyad kyis stong ste/ dpu'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
chod la rnam par thar pa brgyad med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag med/ byang chub sems dpa' mad do// rnam par thar pa'i
sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa med pa ni rnam par tharapa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pas stong
ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa med// byang chub sems dpa' med do// mno
bar shes pa rnams ni mngon pashes pa rnams kyis stong ste danI'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams med/ byang chub sams dpa' med do//
ting 'dzin rnams ni ting 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyidal tingang 'dzin rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// gzungs kyi sgo
rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ dazhi'i phyogs zhen/ stong ba nyid la gzus kyi sgo rnams med/ byang chub sems dpo'amed de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
skyobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ byang chub sangs dpal
med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams ni 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ ci phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rmi'ajigs pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do//
0/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'i so so yang dag pa ga ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid laso so yang dag pa yig pa rnams med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do// snying rjecan bo ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'ikhyi zhen/ stong pa nyid la sI pa chen po med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma'adres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ byang chub
sams dpa' med do// chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ draci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings med/ byang chub sems dpa'
med do// de bzhin nyidan da bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ da ci'i phyibazhin/ stong pa nyid la de bzhinyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// yang dag pa'i
mtha' ni yang dgakha'i mthas stong ste/ de ni phyir zhe na/ stong ba nyid la yang dag pa'i mtha'amed/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i
dbyings na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyibazhin/ stong pa nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/
thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ ci'i phyir na/ stong panyid la thams cad shes banyid med/ byang chub sams dbal
ched do// lam gyi rnam shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam ba shes pa nyid med/ byang chub samA dpa'
med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam ba thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyis stong ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ stongapa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid med/ byang chub
sams dpa' med do// nyan thos kyi thag pa nyan thos kyi khrig pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyigazhan/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med byang chub sems dang 'a med do//
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg ba ni rongasangs rgyas kyi theg ngas stong ste/ ci'i phyir zhen/ stoyenyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dang 'amed do//
sangs rgyas kyi theg pa nisangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid lasangs rgyas kyi theg pa med byang chub sems dpa' med do// nyan thos
ninyan thos kyis stong ste/ daci'i phyir zhen/ stong nyidilanyan thos med/ byang chub sams dba'amed do// rang sangs rgyas nirang sangs rgyas kyis stong ste/ 'i ]
phyi nan/ stong nyid la rang sangs rgyas med/ byang chub samasadapa'i med do// de bzhin gshakas pa ni de bzhin gshags pas stong ste/ de'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid la/
de bzhin gshegs pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang nubasams dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu
mang med cing mi dmigs so// tshor babyang chub sems dpal zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigasaso// 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba des bu yumedaching
mi dmigs so// 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba da ltayang medacing mi
dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA rad to'abu/ gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis bya chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thamasacad la dmigs na//
byang chub sems dbanigang zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rtsol tu phyin pa ni gzhig lagadams shing rjes su bstan pa bya zhes zer ba nici'i phyir/ de skad smras zhes zebani/ tshe dang
ldan par dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs la medacing mi dmigasaso// gzugs ni tshong ba la medacing mi dmigs so// tshor bani bal med cing mi dmigasaso//
tshong ba ni gzugs la mda'i midamigasas// gzugs dang tshor mi'adu shes med cing midamigs so// 'du shes 'du shes med cing mi dmigs/
so 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshorab l mecung mi dmigs so// gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'dushes ni 'du byed rnams me de mi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni 'du
byad rnams la yod sring gi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams nigazugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shesal modacing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cingam dmigs so// rnam par shes pani rnam par shes pa lamedazhing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dngatshor ba dang
'dushes dang 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni de gal medawing mi dmigs so// mig ni rnab lamed cing mi dmig so//
klu rnab ni rnabal med cing mi dmigs sa// rnakhani mig med cing mi dmigs so// mig dang rnab ni sna la med ni mi dmigs so// sna na la med pa dmigs
so sna nimig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so// mig dang rna ba dang sna ni rtsol med cing mi dmigs so// lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so// lce nimig/
dang rnab dang ga med cing ming migs so// mig dang rtswa thang du su dang 'bri mi'i sa len kA
da na dka/ 'aarngamadramags sa// mag dang rna ba dang sna dang lce na lus l meceng me dmegs so// lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so// las ni mig
dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigasaso// mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so// yid yid la medatsang mi dmigasaso// yid
nimig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs sa// sa ni
sgra la med cing mi dmigs so// sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang skya ni dril mecing mi dmigs so// drin dril med cing mi dmigs so/ ni
gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang drin la med cing mi dmigs so// smon lamed cing mi dmigs so// 'oni gzugs dang sgra dang dril med/
cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni'i gal med snying mi dmigs so// regani ragal medacing midamigs so// reg na gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang rol
sgradang dri ngad 'gal medasim dmigs so// migagi rnam bshes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam
mo bshes pa'i rna ba ma ba shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// rnaba'i rnam pa shes pan rnaba'i rnam par shes pa la mngacing mi dmigasaso/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes ba ni mig gi
rnamakha shas ba med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam pa shes pa dang/ rnaba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam pa shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa
nisa'i rnam pa shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam parngashes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes ba dang/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi rnam
ba'ang shes pa dang/ rnab rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam pa shes pa ni rtse'i rnam pa shes pa la med cing ma dmigs so// lce'i rnam pangashes pani lce'i rnam pa shes pa la
med cing mi dmigs so// lcen+d+rinam bar ngashes pa ni mig gi rnam pa shes pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// mig
gi rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes ba dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//
lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam pa shes pa'i tshamed cing ma dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam pa shes pa dang/ rnab rnababashes pa dang/ sna'i//
rnam nga ngashes pa dang/ lce'i rnam pa shes pa la med cing ma dmigs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ snya'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ lce'i
rnam pa shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam ba shes pa ni yid kyi rnam bshes pa la med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam pangashes ba ni yid kyi rnam pa shes pa la med mi yi dmigs
so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam pa=shes pa dang/ rnaba'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam
par shes pa lamed cing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus tareg pa nimig gi 'dus te reg pa la medatsinge mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnab 'dus te reg pa med
cing mi dmigasaso// rnaba'i'adus tareg pa ni rnabali'adus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so// rnaba'i 'dus tingeg pa ni mig gi 'dus rig pa la med cing mdamigs so
mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnabali'angs tareg pa ni snali'adus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigasaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus tareg pa la med cing mi dmigAso//
sna'i 'dus te reg bzhi mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnapa'i rdzus te reg pa medacing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnaba'i 'dus pa sreg pa
dang[Y ]sna 'dus te reg pa'i rtsali'adus tareg pa la med cing ming lags so/ lce'i 'dus ta reg pa nirtse'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigasas// lceli'adus ta sreg pa
ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnapa'i'adus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/
sna'i 'dus ta reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te drag pa la med cing mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus tangeg pa la med cing mi dmigs
so lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus tAreg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/
thog gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rnapa'i 'dus tarog pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te regapa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nyid kyi'adus tarig pa la med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus tareg pa dang/ rnaba'i
'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg bdang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang lus kyi 'dus taceg pa la med cing mi dmigasaso// mig gi 'dus tareg pa las byung/
ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus tagog pa las byung ba'i tshor bal med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las bya ba'i tshor ba ni/ rnapa'i 'dus te dreg pa las[” ]/
byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmogasaso// rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba ni/ rna ba'a'adus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// na ba'i
'dus sngog pas byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa sa byang pa'its+tsher ba la ming mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang rnaba'i
'dus te reg pa lasabyung ba'i tshor bani/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung po'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// stsali'adus te reg pa las byung ba'i ri bani/ stsali'angs
tareg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi rnamigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung batsho ba ni/ mig gi 'dus tag b.las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ rnabasi'adus te/
reg pa las byu kho'itshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te regab las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ rna ba'i dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ stsali'adus
reg ba las byung ba'i tshor zhi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsho ba med cing mi dmigasas// lce'i 'dus te drag pa las byung ba'i tsho ba ni/ lce'i//
'dus tag bas byunganga'i tshor ba la mid cing mi dmigasaso// lce'i 'dus rig pas byung ba'i tshor bani/ mig gi 'dus ta ga phas byung tshor ba dang/ rnapali'adus te
reg pa las byung pa'iring ba dang/ sna'i 'dus rig pa su byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te gapa las byungapa'i tshor ba dang/ rnapali'adus te
reg las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te se gapalas byung ba'i
tshorab la med cing mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus tarngug po las byung ba'i tshor ba ni// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshong ba la med cing mi dgos so// lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ migagi 'dus te reg pa las byubatsong ba dang/ rna ba'as ta rgyag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la medazhing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa laso byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa las
dbyung ba'i tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg ba las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byuba'i tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lasu byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi/
'dus te sreg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus ta reg pa las byung pa'itsho ba ni/ yid kyi 'dusatareg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la medacing mi dmigasaso//
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te drag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ rnab 'dus pa sngog pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te Dag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'itshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//// shes rab kyi
pha srol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyapa bam po gya gcig pa// sa'i khams nis khamasaMl meda'ang mi dmigs so/ sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmags so//
chu'i khams ni tshul khams la medacing mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ sa'i khams dang skulikhams na melikhams pa med cing mi dmigs//
ma'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so// mi'i khams ni sa'i khams dang chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i ]]
khamasagi ngagi khams la med cing mi dmigs so// rlung gi khamasakirlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams nas khams dang/ chu'i
khamasadang/ me'i khams mi ci midamigasaso// sa khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams nam mkha'i khams med cing mi
dmigasaso// nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams la mecing midamigasaso// nam mkha'i khams nis khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/
rlung gi khams mnying mi dmigs so// sa'ikhams drang/ chu'i khams dang/ malikhams dang/ rlung gi khams dang namamakhakhrikhamasani rnam par shes
ba'i khams la med cing mi dmigasaso// rnam bshes pa'i khamasani rnam pa shes ba'i khams la med cing mi dmigos so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nisa'ikhams dang/
chu'i khams dang/ melikhams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha'i khamasal medacing mi dmigs so// ma rig pa ni ma rig pa la medacing mi dmigs so// ma
ga bani'adu byed l med cing mi dmigasaso// 'du byad 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so// 'du byed ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dang 'du
byed ni rnam par shes pa la med cimi dmigs go// rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa ngashes ba a me ming mi dmigs so// rnam pa shes pa ni ma rig pa dang 'dubyed la medacing
mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dang/ 'dubyed dang/ rnam pa shesapa ming dang gzugs med ni midamigs so// ming dang gzugs mi dang gzugasa'amed
cing mi dmigs so/ ming dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam parngashesapa med cing mi dmigs so/ ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par
shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs ni skye mchadadragal medacing mi dmigasas// skye mched dru gnas kye mched drugal med cing mi dmigs so/ skye mched drug ni ma rig pa dang/ 'du
byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs lamed cingamidamigasaso// ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnamapa shes ba dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/
stsamachod drug ni rig pa la med snying midamigasaso// rag pani ga pa lamedacing mi dmigs so// rig banam rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes ba dung/
ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mchedadrug lamed cing mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes ba dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched
drug dang/ reb bal med cing mi dmigs so// tshor bzhi'i sa lamed cing mi dmigasaso// tshor ba'i ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes/
bdang/ mi dngagazugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa'i m ming mi dmigs// ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnamakhangashes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/

tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i gol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin

phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing midamigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyipha rol tu phyin pa
