dang smon pa med sa bya bar ye gsu na rtog go/ su da pa zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yig sum rtogag/ srid pa dban zhes bya ba dang/ me dbon zhig bya ba ni sum rtegano ba
gces bya ba dang/ mo ga chog bya ba'i sa ngos su mi rtog gekaskyab badra zhag bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes par 'os su mi rtog go/ su ba bganyen bya ba dang dag nga ces bya bar 'os su
mgag sla bsdug cog khyab dang/ mi sdug cig bya bar ye gsum gno skye ba zhig bya ba dang/ ma sbyong zhes bya bar yas su martig go/ gla ba mtshan ma med ces ba dang/ mtshan m
mdachos bu bor yes su mo rtog go/ bya ba smonang yachos bu bi ra smin gong sog bu pa sa yos su na rtogage/spu ba zhi zhes bya bar ng/ ma nizhes byar de sa su mo rtog ge sleb
dbenazhes khyab dang/ med pagazhas khyabar mngos su mi rtog go// gces byang ng/ mig ces bya bar sasu mi rtog go/ gshi bde zhes bya dang/ sdug bsngal
la zhes bya bar po sa sum rtogag dag bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces khyabar yohasumi rtog go rgashisdug ces bya bangang mi sngagacos khyabar yongs su mi ga go shi song zhig bya ba dang
ma gong las bya bar yongs su rtog ge/ mashamtshan ma yodacas bya pa drang mtshan s med cig bya bar shes su mi rtogag/ rgyashisAmIr ya nga 'os bab dang smon pa med cas byabar ya sa sum
rtog go/ rgazhi zhi zhes bya ba dang 'am zhi zhes bya ba yog su mi rtog go cha shadaben zhes bya ba dang dam dben zhes gu pa'i ya ngos su mig gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steb

phrag brgya pa bam po brgyad nubya ngagung// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa byug rtses bar dang/ mi rtagacag bya bar yis su ma rtog go/ spyan ra 'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes byabar yodran
su gi rtog ge spyan nga 'i ma'o tu phyin pa badrag can du bdang/ bdugameces bya bar yangs su ma rtog go/ spyirang 'a'o tu'ub nu ga ces bya ba dang/ ma bug ces bya bar mosu su mi rtog ge/ sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyan po gang zhig bu ba dang/ mi stong gi bla bar yos su ma tig ge/ spyanapa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba ngang/ mtshan ma mi skyes bu bar yongs su ma gnod sbyin pa'i

dza'ol tu ngun pa smon pa yong chen bya ba dang/ smyan nga med ces bya ba yes su ni rtog go/ spyan ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nas bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya par yis su mi rtog go/ spyan pa'i dza rol tu phyin
dbenazhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes bya bar yangs su ma rtogago/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtags bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yo jas su mgage/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba bde nas bya ba dang/ spu ga bsngal zhes bya bar yes su ma gag/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu khyen pa bag ces bya ba dang/ bdagamodas pabar yongs su mi rtog ge/ tshul khrims kyi ya la

tukhyen pa sdug ces bya ba rong/ ma sprug ces bya bar ya dras su mi rtog go/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyong zhes bya ba dang 'amaskong zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tuphyin mtshan n las bab dung/ mtshan s nad cig bya bar yongs su rtog ge/ tshul khri'is kyi TA rol tu phyin pasmin pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smyon pa med nas bya bar yongs su mi rtog

go/tshul khrims kyi partsel tuphyin pa zha zhes bya ba drang/ ma zhi zhas bya bar yi ngos su ma ga ge/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang dam dben zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/
khazed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtaganyis khu ba dang/ mgaces bya bar yongs su man/ge/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bango zhig byabarang/ sngag bsal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ godapa
pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yidzanya su mi rtog ge/ bzod nga 'a 'al tu phyin pa sdug ces bya pa ngu/ mi smra gces bya bar yig sum rtog ge/ bzod

pha rol tu phyin pa ste zhes bya ba dang/ masong zhes bya bar ba ngos su sa rtogago/ bu'od nga 'i pha 'o tu phyin pa mtshan ma yodraces bya ba dang/ mtshanum med ces bya bar yajos su mi rtog go/ bzod pa'i

la tu phyin pa sman pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar la rjes gu ma rtog ge/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zha zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yis nu ma rtog go/ bzidang 'i pha rol tu phyin
pa yin zhes bya ba dang/ mdabenazhes bya bar yid s su mi rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar ya rdzob su ma rtog ge/ brtson 'grus kyi yal tu phyin
nga ba zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog ge brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya ba dang/ bdag ni ngas phyabar yos/sun u0f7a rtog go/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
khyen pa gragaces khub dang/ ma byas zas bya ba'i yigusu la rtog ge/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhis bya ba dang/ ma song zhes bya bar shes su mi rtog ge/brtson 'grus kyi pha rolotu
bzhi pa mtshan ma yod ces bya pa dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yegasumartog go brtson 'grus kyi pha re'i duphyin pasman pa yod ces bya ba dang/ sman pa med cig bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/

tub/ brtson khrab kyi ra 'o tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhe zhes bya bar dngos su na rtog ge/u0f8brtson 'grus kyi nga rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma ngang na zhes bya ba na ya sa sum rtag go ra gam gtan gyi
rol tuphyin r rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtagatsus bya bar yi ngos su na rtogage/ ngas mgatan gyi 'bol phyin pa la de zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsnga' zhig bya bar ra ngas ba rtog gekor na gtan gyi
pha rol tu phyin pa dag skyes bu ba dang/ bdag med zhig bya bar 'a sa la rtog go/bgan gtan gyi pha 'o tu phyin pa sprug cig bu nga dang/ mi sdug skyes bu bar yongs su sa rtog go/ bsam gtan gyi
pha rol phyin pa song zhes bya ba dang/ ma steng zhig bya 'a yongos su na rtog go/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa mtshan me 'od kyis bya ba dang/ mnanam da nyeg bu par yongs su mi gagro/ bsam gta

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa spen pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smonong med rug bya bar yas su mi rtogago/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yod sazhu mi rtog go/ bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin ng ngabazhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su ma ga go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma gces bya bar yab sum rtogago/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhes

bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ shes rab kyi ba la tu phyin pa sbragaces lubazang/
masdug ces bya bar yathos su ma rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog ge shes rab kyi rel tu phyin pa mnam yang
la sa bya ba dang/ mtshan ma ris bya bar ye gsum rtog go shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yangs su mi rtog gi/ shag 'gagyi pha rol tuphyin pa

sbyan sa bu ba dang/ ma zhu zhes pa par yi ngos su mi rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dbon zhes bya ba ngang/ ma dban zhes bya bar ngos su mi rtog go nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag
chus bya bar yabakasu mi rtog go nang spyod pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ya ngos sum rtog go/ ma spyod pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med cog bu bar yolasum rtog go/
[$ ]nang stong pa nyid sdug cig bya ba dang/ ma gcagabya bar rogasum ga go/ nang stongapa nyid stong zhes bya ba ngang/ ma stong zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog ge/ nang stong pa nyidamtshan ma yod cin
bya ba dang/ mtshan ma me thos bya bar yongs su sa rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces pa bang[”]snyenapa mang su bya bar yas ma rtogago/ stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma nizhes
bya bar shes su mi rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid dban nag bya ba dang/ ma dbonates bu bar las bu mo rtog ge/ phyi stod panyid rtag cis khu ba dang/ ma rtog ces bya ba yong gsum rtog go//

khri stong ba nyid bdu zhes bya ba dang// sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yag su mi rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag cag bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yangos su mi rtog go/ phyistong ba nyeng su ga ces bya

ba dang/ ma sngag reg bya bar yong sa su mi gage/ phyi stong pa nyeng song zhes bya ba dang/ ma stong zhes pya bar yas su ma ga ge phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yongaskyes bu ba dang/ mtshan ma mngon thub

yos su de ga ge/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yang chos bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yajog su mi rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhig bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ phyistong pa

nyid ban zhes bya ba dang/ mi dban zhig bya bar yongs su ma rtogagi/ phyin stong pa nying rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongasasu mi ga go/phyin dang nga nyid gang zhes bya ba ngang/ bu gabasngal

khrug bu bar la kobs su ma tshugagi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdagacog bu ba dang/ bdag nad sa bya bar yabasu ma rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid grwa gtsos bu bar ng ma dag skyes bu bar ma gsum rtog go

phyi nang gang ba nyid stong zhig bya bar ng/ mi stong zhi bya ra ya sa su a rtog ge phyin ng stong ra byed na tshan ma yod pa'i phya ba dang dmtshan mo re nga thog bya bar mdzag su ma rtogagi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid

smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med cig bya bar dngos su mi rtogago/ phyin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang 'am zhe zhib bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/phyi nga stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang/
ma dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ spyod pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ mirtagaces bya bas thos su ma rtog gestongang nyi stekha nying bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal//
zhig bya bar ya sa su mi rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid bdag cag bya ba dang/ bdagamed ces bya bar yas su mi rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang/ ma gces bya ba'i yo

sum rtagage/ stong pa zhed stong pa nyid stong zhig bya ba dang/ ma skyong zhes byabar yog su ma rtogago/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyidamtshan ma yi datsos bya ba ngang/mtshan man ngaces bya bar ya sa su mi rtog

ga 3stong pa nyid stong pa nying gyon pa yang cig bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong pa nyid sbyong pa nyung zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma nozhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ u0f7anga ngang skyong
pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang/ mngaban zhes bya bar ye asum rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyeng gcig bya ba dang/ ma rtag ces bya bar yas su ma rtog go/ pa sbyong pa nying bde zhes budang/ sdug
bsdu zhes bya bar yathagasum rtog go/ tshan pasnying panyid bdag cig bya ba dang/ bdag med rten 'bar yosasumartogage/ chanang ngang nyid sdug ces bya bar ng/ mi sdug ces bya bar yongs sum

go(chin pa song ba ti stopa kyi bya ba dang/ mi ged zhas bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ chen postod panyid mtshan ma yo ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med cig du bag phebasasum rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyi ngosmyon pa yong

[7 ]/ga bu nga 'dra snyan ng med ces bya ba ye rjes su mi rtog go/ chen pasung nga nyid ni zhes bya ba dang/ ma 'a zhen du par yig tu mi rtog ge/ chen postong ba nyid dang nazhes bya ba dang/ mdaben zhes bub
yongs su mi rtog go/ don dam stong pa nying rtags bya ba dang/ na ga ces bya bar yig su mi rtog go/ donadas pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sug bsngal zhes bya bar yidzes su mu rtogogo/
nangan pa skyong pa nyid bganyag bya ba dang// bag med smon lungar ya dzasasum rtogag/ donangs pa stong pa nyid sdug cig bya ba dang/ malcag rten bya bar yosu mi rtog go/ nadam pa stong pa nyid stong

zhag bya bdang/ 'a snying zhes bya bar yabs su na rtog go/ denang mo pa stong ra nyings tshanan 'da' bya ba nga/ mtsham meng cos bya bar yongosu ma gogo/ den dam pa stong nga nga smyon pa yod cig tu bodad/

smenang med nyes ba bar yos su mi rtog ge/ donongs pa da nga nyid zhi mos du ba dang/ nu zhi zhes bya bar mdo mi rtog go/ donongs nga stong pa nyid len zhe bya ba dang/ midaben zhi bya bar ya su mi rtogago/ 'dus byas

sbyong nga nyid rtags bya ba dang/ mi rtag son bya bar yos su 'gag/lus byas rang nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yathosasumi rtog go/'dus byas stong pa nyid ngangags bya ba dang/ bajog
med ces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go 'au byas stong nga nyid sdug ces bya ba dang/ ma spu gces bya ba yi ngos su mi rtog go 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhig bya ba dang/ ma song zhes bya bar yongs su
tsa ka ka/ kuny+tsa/ ma rtagage 'dus byas stong pa nyidamtshan ma yong ces bya ba dang/ mtshan mamad cesang ba yongs sum rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya budang/ sngon pached//
ces bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyide zhu zhis bya thadang/ mazhi zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ 'dus byas stong pa nyang dben zhes bya ba dang/ mdebenazhes g bar yongs su mi
rtogano/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid rtagicos byab dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su ma ga go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa de bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes byabar yongs su mi rtog go 'du/
mabus stong pa de bdagaces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ 'ang ma byas stor 'de sngog ces bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ 'dus padus srong pa
nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidamtshan ma yod cesakhyob dang mtshan ma med cos byabar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'dusal bas stong pa nyid/
ston pa yod ces bya dang/ sonapa med ces bya bar yongs sum rtogago/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyade zha zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes
khab dang/ mdabonazhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa de rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtog ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ mtha' las 'dasapa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba/

0/dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su murtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag medaces bya bar yongs su ma rtog ge/ mtho' las cangs pa stong pa nyare sdug ces bya ba dang/

chasdug cisabya bar 'ongasas ma rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ ma steng shes bya bar yongs su ma rtog/ mthar las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod rtsis bya ba dang
mnom med cesabya bar yos/sum rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smonapa cesab pa dang/ smonapa med ces bya bar yos su ma rtog go/ mtha' 'as 'dus pa stong pa nyide zhazhis bya ba dang/ ma
zhi zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog ge/ mthar 'as 'dus pa stong ba nyid dben zhes bya ba dang/ mo dben zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog ge/ thogamadang thamamed pa stong rkyang rtag ces bya ba dang dam rtog
ces bya bar yos sum rtogago/ thog ma dang thamamed pa stong bar bde zhes byab dang/ sngagabasngal zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ thogadang thamamed pa stong pa nyidi bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med

ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ thogamadang tha mamed pa stongang nyade sdug ces bya ba dang/ mo sdug res bya bar yong susum rtog go/ thogam rang thagamed pa skyod de stong zhes bya ba dang/ nistong zhes

bar yongs sum rtog go/ thog ma dang thamamed pastong pa nyide mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma mdacos bya bar yongasasu tsha rtagage/ thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa ni smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon
[pr]@#// bamad ces bya bar yos su mi rtog ge thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sha zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ thog marang thag med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes//
byub dang/ mdeben zhes bya bar yo gsum rtog go/ dragrab med ba stongang nyid rtag me/bya ba dang/ mi rtag cesabya par yongs sum rtog go/ der bzhed pa stongs nga bde zhes b dang sdug bsngal

zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ dor ba med pa stong nyid bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdagamed ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dor bamod pa stong pa red sdug ces byab dang/ ma sdug ces bya bar mdzes mi rtog

go dor ba med pa stongar de stongazhes grub dang/ masnying zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ der ba med pa stong pa demtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang// mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog ge/ dor

! bsnyad pa stong ba nyid ston pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go der ba med pa stong pa nying zhu zhes bya bar ng/ mazhi zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ dor ba med pa stong

panyade dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes bya bar yos sa ma rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya dang/ mi rtaganyesang ba yosasu mi rtog ge/ rang bzhin stong pa nyidi bde zhes bya ba dang/
smyug bsngal zhes bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ rang bzhin stong zhing bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces byabar yongs su ma rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyade sdug ces bya ba dang/ ma sdug
ces bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su ma reg go/ kha bzhi mestong pa de mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan mched//
ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ dgrab zhi'i stong pa desmon pa yod ces bya bdang/ smonapa med ces bya bar yongs su ma reg go/ rang bzhazhestong ba de zhi yis byang dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bas
sum rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma depen zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog ge/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ mig ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog ge ro
thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su ma ga go/ chos thams cad stongapa nyidi bdag ces byab dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go dngosAthamA

cad stong ba nyade sdugaces bya ba dang/ masdug ces bya ba yongs su ma rtog ge/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ misong zhes bya bar lo gsum rtog ge/ chos thaAcad stong pa nyid 'tshal/
yong ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa yodacesababangang/ smonapa med cesabya bar yongs sum rtog go/ chos thams cad stongab re zhu

zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rnyes shams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes ba dang mngaban zhes bya bar yongs sum jog go/ ngangag mtshan de stong pa nyid rtag ces byabadang/ mi rtag
ces thub yongs su mashago/ rang gatshan de stong pa nyade bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ nga gi mtshan nyid stong pa de bdag ces bya ba dang/
bdag med ces byab yongs su mi rtog go/ rang gi mtshan de stong pa nyid sdug ces byab dang/ mi sdug ces bya ba yongos sum reg go/ rang gsetshan tang stong pa nyid/ zhes thang/ mi stong zhes
khyabar you su mi rtog go/ rang gamtshan 'di stong pa nyid latshanam yod cesabyob dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rang gi mtshon de stong pa de smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon

pa med ces pa'i yongasasum rtog go/ rang gamtshan nyid stong pa nyide zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhu zhes bya ba yongs su ma rtog go/ rang gi mtshand stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi deben zhes bya ba
yog sum rtog go/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtagasos bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ ma demages pa stong pa 'di bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog
go ma rImaMgasal stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago mngamigs pa skyo ba de sdug ces bya ba dang/ ma lcog ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ mo remage
pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su lo rtog go/ ma ngamigs pa stos 'de mtshonam yod ces bya ba dngo ( mtshom med ces bya bar yongs su kirtog go/ ma dmigs
pa stong pa 'di smonapa yod ces bya ba dang/ smo nang med nyes byab yongs su mi rtog go/ mi dmigs pa stong pa 'du zhi zhes pa dang/ ma zha zhes ng ba yongs sum rtog go/ ma dmigs pa stong ba nyid/
raben zhes bya ba dang/ mi raben zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ das ma da stong pa de rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtag ces bya ba yongs sum rtog go/ dngos po med pa stong pa de bde zhes bya ba/
dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba yongasus ma rtog go/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces byab dang/ bdagamed ces bya bar yongasasu mi rtogago/ dngos po med pa stongapa/de sdug ces bya ba dang/ malcag
ceg bya de yos su mi rtog go/ dngos po med stong pa de stong zhes bya ba dang/ ma ste zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go dngos po med pa stong ba 'demtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mnaM dam med ces

bya bar yongs su ma rdzogago/ dngos po med pa stong pa desmyon pa yod ces bya ba dang// smonapa med ces bya bar yongs sum rtogago/ dngos po med pa stong pa nying sha zhes bya ba dang/ ma' zhes byabar yongs su mi rtog go/ dngos

po med bstong po de dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma deben zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ ngo bo nyid stong nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtagaces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug/

bsngal zhes bya bar yos su mi rtogage/ ngobe nyade stongapa nyidi bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med cesabya bar yongs sum rtogago/ ngo bo tshong stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang/ ma sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog
@#// go ngob de stong pa desong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtogago/ nga'o stongapa nyid katshanam yod ces bya ba dang mnaM mamadaces bya bar yengs su ma rtog go

nge ba 'di stong pa nyid smonapa yod ces bya ba dang rtsol medaces byab ra yongs su mi rtog go/ ngo bodi stongang 'de zhu zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhes bya ba yongs su ma reg go/ ngolo nyid stong pa 'du dbon zhes bya

ba dang/ ma deben zhes bya bar yongs su me tog gi/ dngos po med pa'i ngos ristongapa rjid rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngodiso ba nying bde zhes bya ba

ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bar yongs sum rtagayo/ dngos po med pa'i ng ba nyid stong pa nyeng bdagacesapa ba dang/ bag med ces bya bar yongs sum togago/ dngos po med par ngo bo'ang stong pa nyid sdug ces tsha

gab dang mi sdig ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo destong paN ted song zhes bya ba dang/ ma myong zhes bya ba yongs su mi rtag ge/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyide man+taM nam

yod ces bya ba dang ]ma nam med ces bya bar yongs su mo rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyar stong nyid smonapa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba yos su mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di

stong pa nyidazhi zhes l ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong ba nyid dbon zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dran pa nye ba'agazhag Artag

ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag rjes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dran pa nye brngagazhagapa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ dranapa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang//

bdag med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog ko/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang/ ma sdug cag bya ba yosasum rtog go/ dranang che bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya ba
yos su mi rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces lu bdang/ mtshan ma mangs byabar yongs sum rtagag/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smonapa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces

bya bar go sa su mi rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhis bya ba dang/ ma zhu zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtogago/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/

yang dag ba slong ba rnams gces bya ba dang/ ma rtaganyes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sngagayasngal zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ yang gang basprong

ba rnams bdag ces byab dang/ bdagamedacos thubar shos su mi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smyug rtses byas dang/ ma sdug ces bya bar yongs su lo rtagako/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ maM
stong zhes pyabar yosasum rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yodaces bya bdang/ mtshan mamed ces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/
gla@#/ smonab medaces bya ba yos sam rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'a zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams daben zhes bya ba nga//

mi bon zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtogago/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkepa rnamasu rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtagaces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamasu bde zhes byang dang/ sdug sngal shes bya bar yod//

mi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams bdagaces bya ba dang ( bdag med cesabya bar yos su mi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams sdug ces bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul

gyi dbang rnams stong zhes bya ba rang mastong zhes bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshamam yongakhas bya ba dang/ mtshamatshamed ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams m+b+hon

pa yod ces bya ba rang smon pa medaces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nam zhi zhes blab dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar ng/
ma khen zhes bya ba yongs su ma rtog go/ dbang po rnams gces bya ba dang/ martegaces bya bar yos sum rtogago/ dbang go rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
yang bo rnams bdag ces bya bdang/ bdag med ces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ bang po rnams smyug ces bya dang/ mosdug ces byabar yongs su mi rtog go/ dbang po rnams stongazhes bya ba dang/ ma stong

zhes bya bar yos su ma rtog go/ dbang bo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasasum steg go/ dbang po rnams sngonapa yod ces bya pa dang/ tsanab mang ces bya bar yongs bum lto

go dbakho rnams zhu zhes bya ba dang/ ma tsha zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ ba po rnams dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma ngeben zhes khyab yongs sum rtogago/ stobs rnams dag ces bya ba dang/ mo rtagaces bya bar

yongs su mi rtog go/ stobs rnams bade zhes bya ba dang/ gabasngal zhes bye ba yongs su mi rtog go/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya bdang/ bdag med ces bya ba yongs su ma rtogage/ stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang/

misdug ces bya ba yongasasu ma rtog go/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ ma stong zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasasu mi
rtog go/ sobs rnams smonapa yod ces bya ba dang/ snon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stobs rnams zhi shes bya bdang/ mtsho zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stobs rnams rapin

zhes bya ba dang/ mdeben zhes bya bar yosas mi rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma gces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ byang chub kyi yon ga rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal
zhes khyabar yosum rtog go byang chub kyi yan lag rnams badag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med tsos byabang yongs su mi rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba dang ma smrag ces bya pordzayodA
su mi rtog go byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes byab dang/ mi stong zhes bya ba longs su mi rtog go byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshamam yod ces bya thadang/ mtshan m/

med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasmonar yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yos su mi rtog sgo/ byang chub kyayan lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma ga zhes bya bar
yogs ma rtogago/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes pa dang/ ma deben zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtagaces bya ba dang/ ma rtagaces bya bar yongs su mi
rtogago/ 'phags pa 'am yan lag brgyang ba bde zhes bya bdang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lagabarkyang pa bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba
yongs sumi rtog go/ 'phags pa'ilAm yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba dang/ misdug ces bya bar shes su mi rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya

bar yongs su mi rtogago/ 'phags pa 'a'i ma yan lag brgyud ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'phagu parwa lam yan lag brgyud pa smom pa yod cesaphyab dang

smon pa mang ces bya bar yongs su mo rtog go/ 'phags pa ni lam yan lag brgyad ba zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhis bya bar yongs sumi rtog go/ 'phags ba'i ma yan lag brgyad pa dbenazhes bya ba dang/ mi

khen zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi gnyes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya babasodra//
su ma rtogago/ 'phags pa'i baden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'phagasaparibaden pa rnams sdugaces bya ba dang/ ma sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/

'phags par baden pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtagag/ 'phags pa'ibadenapa rnams mtshams yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med cesabye bar yos su mi rtog ge/'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams smonapa yod ces bya ba dang// smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'phags parnga bdenang rnams zha zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhazhes bya bar yos su mi rtog ge/ 'phags pa'i bden rnams
dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi dpen zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma gces bya bar yongasasum rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal
zhes byabar yongs su ma rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams sbagaces bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su la rtog
ko bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ ma song zhes byabar yongs su mi rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma mod ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog ko/ bsam
gtana rnams son yod ces bya budang/ gyonar medaces bya bar yongs sum rtogago bsam gtan rnams zhi zhig bya ba dang mazhi zhes bya bar yos sum rtog go khasamag ta
rnams dben zhes bya bdang/ mdeben zhes byab yos su ma rtogago/ tshadazhed pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtagaces bya bar yongs su mi rtogago/ tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal

zhes bya bar yosasu mi rtog go/ tshad med pa rnams badag ces bya ba dang/ bgazhed ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshad medang rnams sdugaces byab dang/ masdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshad med

pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mostong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ maMdamod nga rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshad mang pa rnams smyon pa yar
ces bya ba dang/ smon med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshad med pa rnams zhu zhis bu bdang ( ma zhi zhes bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ tshad med pa rnams daren zhes bya ba dang/ mi raben zhen
khyabar yongs su mi rtog go/ gzugs med pa'i sems pa la'ajug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtagaces bya bar yongs su mi rtogago/ gzugs med pa'i sems pa ba'ajugab rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ gzugs med pa'isomasar 'jugapa rnams bdag ces bya dang da bdag mang ces bya bar yosasu mi rtog ge/ gzugs meng pa'i snyoms bar 'gab/
[n/]sdug ces bya ba dang/ mi smyug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ gzugs med pa sems par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog ge/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug
ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ gzugs med pa'i sgoms pa ra'ajug pa tshams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smob mad ces bya bar yongs su mi
rtogag/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhazhes bya ba dang/ ma zha zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ gzugs med pa'+rasems nga pha'ajug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dpe na zhes
bya bar yos mu ma rtog// rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtog res bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rnam pa tha pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bstsal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag medache/bya bar yongs su ma rtogag/ rnam par thar pa rnams smyug ces bya ba dang/ mo smug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams

stong zhes byab dang/ ma skyong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma madracesabya bar yosasu ma rtogogo/ rnam par sha' pa rnams smyon pa yod ces
bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bdang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtogago/ rnam par thar ba rnams dpen zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes
dbyabar yongs sum rtog go/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa rnams gces bya bdang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i somasapa la'ajug//

pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba yongs sa ma rtog go/ mthar gyisa gnas apa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bdang/ bdag medanyes bya bar yos su mi rtog ge/ mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms pa la 'jugapa rnams sngog ces bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces byabar yos sum rtog go/ mah+phalagyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ng/ mi stobazhos byashar yongs sum rtog go
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams mtshan mo yod ces slob dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasasum rtog go/ mtha' gyis gnasapa'isoms pa 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/
smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang/ na no zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go tha rgyas gnas pa'i sdomA par 'jug pa rnams

dben zhes bya ba dang/ mdeben zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshamam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma ga ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa de zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i yongs su ma rtog no/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtsha na ma ]
[pl]/ med pa dang/ smanapa mang pa bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag medaces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ rnam par tharapa' s+sestopanyade dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon patshadapa sdug ces bya
ba dang/ mi ljagaces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa/de dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smopa mdang stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes byabar yongs sum rtogago/

rnamapar thar pariwi stong pa de dang/ mtshan mamed pa dang/ smon pa med pa mtshamam yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan mamang nyes bya ba yos sum rtagago/ rnam pa'i thur pa'i sgo stong patated dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ snyon

bzhed ngasmonapa yod ces bya ba dang/ sngon med ces bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ dam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshams med pa dang/ sngon med pa zhu zhes bya ba dang/ mtsho zhes byabar yolasu ma rtogago

rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smomapa yod pa dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi dpon zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ mngon par shesapa rnams rtagaces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya
bar yongs su ma rtogag/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ man par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar
yongs su mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya bdang/ ma smyugacis bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog
go mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan mame ces bya bar yongs su lo rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams smyon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ sbopa ne 8ces bya/
bar yongs sum ga go/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma nizhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang mi dbenazhes ng ba yongs su ma rtogago/ ting

pa'i dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtagaces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ badrag
med ces bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smyug ces bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ dpe de 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ ma steng zhes bya bar yongs su mi

gab ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med cesabya bar yas su mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sngonar yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa medaces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ ting nge 'dzin
[¥/ ] rnamag zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya ba yos su ma rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dbon zhes bya ba dang/ ma dbenazhes bya ba yongs su ma rtog go/ gzus kyi sgo rnams rtagaces bya ba dang/
rtagaces bya bar yongs su ma rtog ge/ gzus kyi sgo rnams bde shes byab dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ gzus kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi
rtogago/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smyug ces bya ba dang/ masdug ces bya bar yos sum rtog go/ gathungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ gzungs kyi po rnams/
mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan mam nyes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ gzus kyi sgo rnams smonar yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongasasu mi rtog go/ gzus kyi sgo rnams zha zhes
bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtag go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbon zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi
rtog ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ de bzhin gshegs pa'istobs rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs par stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/
bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs par stobs rnams sngagaces bya ba dang/ ma sdug ces bya ba yos su mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba
dang mi stong zhes bya bar yos sum rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyibs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma medacos bya ba yos su ma ga go/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs
rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs parisnyobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhazhis thabar yosu mi rtogago/ de bzhin gshags pa'i
stobs rnams dbenazhes bya ba dang/ mi dbon zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ mi 'jigs pa rnams rtagaces bya ba dang/ mi rtagaces bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ mi 'jigs pa/
rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ ma 'jigs pa rnams bdagaces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su gi rtog go/ mi 'jig pa rnams sdug ces
bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces bya bar yi mas ma rtog go/ mi 'jigs pa chagasastong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan
ma med ces bya bar yisasu ma rtogago/ ma 'jigasang rnams sonapa yodaces bya ba dang/ smonapa med ces bya bar yongs su mu rtogago/ ma 'jigs pa rnams zhu zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs
su mi rtog go/ ma 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi deben zhes bya bar yongasasum rtog ge/ sa sa yang dag par rage pa rnams rtagaces byang dang/mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
soso yang dag par 'geng rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ so so pas yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces byapha drang/ bdagayod ces bya bar lo sa sum rtog
go mo so yang dag nga rag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba rang/ mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so zhes byabangang/ rma stong zhes bya bar yodzes sum rtog go/so

07 so yang dag pa rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshakamamangaces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ so so yang drag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bdang smon pamagaces bya bar yongs sum//
rtog ga/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ so sos 'jug par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/

pa chen po rtag cesabya ba dang/ mo rtag ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang/ smyugabasngal zhes bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ byams pa chen pobadag shes bya bdang/ bdag

medaces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po sngagaces bya ba dang/ mi sdugaces bya bar yongs su ma tog do/ byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtogago/
byams ba chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po sbomapa yod ces bya ba dang/ ston pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dunas

ba chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yos su mo rtog ge/ khams pa chen po dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dpenazhes bya ba yongs su ma rtogago/ mang rje chen po gces bya ba dang/ ma rteganyesal
bar yongs su mi rtog go/ snying rje chemapo bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasasum rtogago/ sIng rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdagamed ces bya ba yongos sul rtog go/ snying
posdug ces bya ba dang/ mi sdug ces byabarayongs su ma rdzogago/ snying rje chen ngo stong zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya bar yosasum rtog go/ snying rje chen po ma tshalam yod ces bya ba//

dang mtshan ma medaces bya bar yongos su mi rtog go/ snying rje chen po sbomapa yod ces bya ba dang/ smonang med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ sAng rje chen po zhazhes bya ba dang/ ma zhes bya bar yongs su
ma rtog go/sa'i nyengo dbenazhes bya ba dang/ mi dbenazhes byab yongs su ma rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtagaces bar yongs su ma rtog go/ sas
rgyas kyi sam 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yos su ma ga go/ sangs rgyas kyatshesam 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag medaces bya bar yongs su mi rtog

go sasargyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang/ mi sngagaces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi sam 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
sas rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod cesang ba dang/ mtsho mchod ces bya ba yos su mi rtog go/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa rnams byon pa yod ces bya dang/ smonapanye nga cesabya
thangayos su mi rtag go/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zha zhes bya beng/ ma zhi zhes bya ba yongs su ma dgo/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dresapa rnams dgon zhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes
bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid rtag cesabya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid badre zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yo thabasu'i

rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nying bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yos su mi rtog go/ thamasacad shesang 'ang sngagacesabya ba dang/ lasngagacosang ba yongs su mi rtog go/ thamasacad ngashes pas

stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yodaces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ thabs cad ngashesapa nyid ston pa yodaces
byab dang/ smonapamed ces bya bar yongs su mo rtogago/ thams cad shes pa nyid zha zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs sum rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes bya bdang/ mi dben
zhes byab yos su mi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pashes pa nyid rtag cesabya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ lam gyi rnamang shes pa nyid bde zhes byab dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bkatshu
su mi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdagu mod ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ 'am gyi rnam pa shes pa ted sdug ces grab dang/ misdugacesakhya b.reyis su ma rtogogo/

'am gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ mistong zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogo go/ lam gyi rnamar shes pa de mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtogo go/ lam gyi
0 1 bya@#/ pa shes pa tismonapa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi ga go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba rang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yos su mi rtogago/
lam gyi ma ba shes pa de ben zhes bya bar ng/ ma dpe zhes bya bar yongasasumi rtog go/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyepa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtagaces bya ba yo sa sum rtog go/ dam pa khroms
cad mkhyenapa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ rnamar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ rnam pasbrags
nyar mkhyen pa rir phyug ces bya ba dang/ misdugs bya bar yongs su ma gago/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dasong zhes bya bar ng/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtogago/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid mtshan ma yod chos bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de smon pa med ce bya ba dang/ rtsonab medaces bya bar yongs sum rtog go rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasasu mi rtog go/ rnam pa thamasacad makhyen pa nyid dben zhes khyab dang/ mdaben zhes bya bar yos sum rtogag/ 'diltaste/ tshongadza'an pa shA ra dwa ti'adu byang chub
rams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chos 'di dag la yongs sum rtog pamadapaN+Ditshul gyis de ltar yongs su rtogago/
0 ] ]ba kyi pha rol duphyin pa stong phra rgyas bsayo dga'acu pa/ (smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraci'i phyi de nyid du/ gzugs kyi ma chos pa gang yine pa de ni gzugs ma yin/
tshor ba'ake skyes pa gang yanib de nitshor bam yin/'du shes kyis skyes pa gang yinupade na 'du shes ma yin/ 'dubyed kyi skyes pa gang yin padon 'du byed m yin/ rnam par ngashisadA'am skyes

ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshodang ldan pa rang 'byor tsa'aphyir na de skad du/ mig gimaskyes pa gang yin pa de ni mog ma yin// rnaba'amaskyesong gang yin dade ni rnam 5ni/ sna'i skye skyes

nga gang yin pa de'i sman yani/ lca'i lo skyes pha gang yin pa de ni lcam yini/ lus kyim skyes pa gang yaning den lus m yin/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de na yod ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rang 'byor tsin+ti

chen de slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yani/ sgra'am skyes pa gang yin pa re sgra ma yin/ driwim skyes pa gang yin pa de nangomi yin/rotsamiskyes pa gang yin pa de ni rom yin

rig gi ma skyes pa gang yazhi pa de ni'ogamayani/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sa ma yin zhes zer/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyire na de skad du/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bskyes pa gang yin

ba de rnamage gnam raNashes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i m skyes pa gang yin pa de'i rna ba'i rlom par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am skyes pa gang yin ra de nasI'i rnam par shes de
ma yine/ lcesminem par shes pa 'am sus pa gang yin pa de nalce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pasamaslus pa gang yin pa re ni las kyi rnam par shes pa ma man//

ma yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'amesesapa gang yang de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bog pa'i phachen de skad du/ mig gi 'dus te regang 'asegos ngagapayanepa de na mig

dus te reg pa//ne/ rnaba'i 'dus te regaparim skyes pa gang yin pa de na rna ba 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ snawa'edus te reg pa'i m skyes pa gang yin pa de nas rA'adus te reg pa ma yin/ lcen 'dus te reg pa=

ma skyes pagang yanepa de na lce'a'adus te regabo a yan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg parnga ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sa yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i m skyes pa gang yin nga de na yod

kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ba'i pha na de skad du/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa tra rkyen gyis tshor bar m skyes pa gang yod pa de ni mogeg 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma

man rnabara'adus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor btsem skyes pa gang yin pa de na rna ba' 'dus rta reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yone/ sArA'adus te theg pa rirkyen gyis tshor ba'i mesos dag nga yin ng deb sna 'dus

da thigangakyin gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te snyeg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher btsan skyes pa gang yin pa den lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu gyisatshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg bat+ti nagyis tshor u0f7ama

skyes bgang yin pa de ni dus kyi dedun te theg pa chen gyis tsho ba ma ine/ yid kyi dngus te sreg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba'am skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lin gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/ tshe

dang ldan pa rab 'byor tsa'ispyir na doskad du/ sa' khems kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de satA u0f7a khams ma yin/ chu khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yanipa de ni chu khams ma yin/ ma'i khams kyi sa skyes pa gang yin

bde 'ame khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni drug khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyim skyes pa gang yanepa de ni nam mkha' khams ma 5 nye/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes ga

ming de ni rnam par shes pa ni khams ma yin zhes bror/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraci 'phye'i nade skad du/ ma ga pa'i m skyes pa gang yin pa de nu ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gong yin pa de ni 'du byed

mayin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nam pangashes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi choskos pa gang yanapa de mumeng dang gzugs ma yane/ semachod dragaganyegyis nga gang yin pa de na sku mched

drug ma yin/ reg nga 'a ne supa gang yin pa de ni rigapa ma yin/ tshos bar ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chos bum 5ni/ srid pa bu ma skyes pa gang yin pa 'asrid pa ma yin/ len pa'i m snyos pa gang yin pa de na rin
pa ma yin/ srid parim skyes pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa re ni skye ba ma pa no/ rga shigam skyes pa gang yin ng de ni rga[~]'amo yane zhes zer/ tsho dang
ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyi'i nade skad du/ sbyin pariwA rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin du de nAspyin pa'i pha rol tuphrinupa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i me smyos//

pa gang yanepa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tshulun pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pho rel tuphyin pa ma yani/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin

pa de nu brtson 'grus kyi snga rol tuphyin pam na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphane nga dim skyes pa gnang nge 'basam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin 'a shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ig skyos pagarnga ya/

pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyanepa ma yin zhes zer/ tshadapaldan pa rab 'byoratshe'aphyare na de stod du/ nang sto pad kyi ma skyes pa gang yin de ni nepastongapa dram yate/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma gos pa gang yin

pa de nuphyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyin stong pa 'dra kyi ma skyes pa gang nepa de ni pha nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stsopa ngastong pa de ma skyes pa gang yanipa don steng pa 'di stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen postong pa

(di kyin skyes pa gang yane pa dena chen po stong pa nyi ma yino/ donadamang stong pa nyid kyis smyos pa gang yin pa de donadamapa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'dusangs

stongang nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes po gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stongapa nga ma yin/ mtha' 'as 'das pa stongapa nyid kyi skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mthar las 'das pa stong pa nyid

ma yan/ thog ma dang than me nga pa stong pa nyid kyis/sa de gang yanang de 'bregon dang tha ma rtsod pa stong pa nyings yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyeng kramasusang gang yang de ni der ba'i da pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang/

bzhin stong pa nyid kyis skyes ba gang yanipa de nang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yazhi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa/gang yanang de na ris thamasacad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa
kod kyi mnyes pa gang yatong de ni seng gtsan de stong pa nyid rtsa yane/ ma remigs nga stong pa de kyi ma skyes po gang yin de nas dmigs pa stong pa 'ang ma yur/ dngos ngo dang stong pa nyid kyi ma

skyes pa bapo yaneng de na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo de stong pa nying kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ngob nyang sto pa pa nyid ma yin/ dngosango med pa ring ba de stongang 3nga kyim skyes pa gang yin nga de

nangangos po med pa'i ngeborta'i stong pa rting ma yumezhes ze3/ tshe srang lngar nga rab 'byoro tsa'or nade skad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyi ma shes pa gang yin pa des dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/

yon yang dag par sbyong ba rnam sA kyi la skyes pa gang yanang re na yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yAn/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gong 5na pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi sku pa rnams ma yin/
dbang po rnams kyi re skyes pa gang yin nga sogs debang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de na stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de
spyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la lan/ 'phags pa lo'e ma yum lag brgyadang ro ma skyes nga gang yin pa de na de phabs pa'in yana'/ga brgyad ma yan/'phags ba ribede/
b rnam kyim skyes pa gang yin de ni le lugs 'baden pa rnams ma yone/ bsam gtan rnams kyim skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams m yAne/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang sarapa de ni/
tshad med pa yasamayazhi/ gzugs med pa snyoms par 'jugapa rnams kyi skyes pa gang yane pa de dgizugs med pa'i sems pa 'jug pa rnams ma 5na/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi maskyes pa gang yin
nga dena rnam par tharang rnams ma yani/ mthagyisa gnas pa'i son bsu par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes b gang yanepa de ni mthar gyib/gnas b.rI sems par 'jug pa rnams m yan/ rnam par thar pa/

sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa/rAm skyes ba gang yang de ni rnam par thar po wiye stong pa red dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapamadapa a yani/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi

ma skyob pa gang yin pa re ni mngon pa 28shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'tshan rnams ma yin/ gzus kyi sgo rnams kyi maskyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzus
kyisgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin bden de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams m zhe/ ma 'jigs pa rnams kyi so skyes pa gang yin pa de na mi 'jiges
[ne]/ b rnams yin/ so so yang dag par sgrig pa rnams kyi mthus nga ga yi bu de nase srong dag par rig pa rnamasum yin/ byams chen po'am skyes pa gang yazhing de na khyebs pa cher ma yin/ snying
rje chen po'am spos dra gaTayan pa de ni snying rje chen bo ma yin/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyims pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnamasum ya a we/ tshong skrun
pa rab 'byor ci'i phyire na de sud du/ thams cad 'osang de kyis ses pa gang yin ng na thoms cad shesapa de mo yin/ lam rnam bshesang nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa dona'im gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yang do no rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang/de na yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smyos nga/ tshe dang ldan pang+kabadu ti'i bu gzugasan gabrug

kyis stong ste/gang stongang de ni gzugs ma yin te skyo ba med do// modang ldan ng ba badra ti'i bu rnamagras des na/gzugs kyis skyes pagang yin pa de gzugs mayin no//tshodang ldan pa shA pra ti'i ngu tshor ba ni

chor busastong ste/ gang stong pa de na tshorabs yin te skye bas da do// tshodang ldan ng/'ub du ti'i ba rnam grangs des na/ tsho badri ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor bal yacheno// tshong ldan ng shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes
na'adu shes kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni 'du shes ma yin te slob med do// tsho dang ldan ng ngashA ra dwa ti'ibu rnam grangs su na/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin//

[r{j]@#// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byeng nu'adu byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan nga' bdu ti'i bu rnam gras des na 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang/

yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dati'i bu rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pasastong ste/ gang gyong pa de na rnam par shes pa ma yan te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa/nAti'i bu rnam grang

wA des na/ rnam ngo shes pa 'am skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes nga mAyan no// tshodang ldan ng shar du'abu cha ga mig gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mgam yame de slob med de// tshod ldan pa shAn

dwa tun bu rnam grangs desan/ mig gam skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mgo ma yin no// tshe dang napa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ban rnathabasos thang stong pa de na rnab ma yin te skya ba med do// tshodang ldan ng sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam gra=
deban/ rnangasaMm skyes pa gang yin pa de rna bam yin no// tshod ldan pa ltar dAte'abu su rasmras song ste/ ga stongapa de ni lcam yin te skye bamed do// dang ldan pa shA rAti'ib rnam grangs desan/

snarim skyes pa gang yin pa desnag yin no// tshodapaldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lcen lces stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra u0f97ti'abu rnam gras des na/ lce'i skyes

pa gang yoming relce ma no// tshodabaldan ng shA ra dwa ti'i rdzogs lu lus kyi gos/ga stong ba de lus ma yin teskye ba med do// tshodang ldan pashar dwa ti'i bu rnamagrongs desan/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa

de lus m yin no/ tshed pa ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang nAyod kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yod ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chum grangs des ra/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yazhe ba de/
mdam yin no// tshodang ldan pa shA radra ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ gapastong pa denig gsam yin skye ba med do// tshodang ldan nga' ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs dres na gzugs kyis skyes

pa gang yin pa degazugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'aphe smin sgras stong ste/ gang stong pa de nasgrom yin te skyo bayod do// spro dang ldan ng sha radu 'bi rnam grangs des ra/ sgra'i maskyes pa gang yanang de sgron

yin no// tshodapaldan ng ba ra dwa ti'i bu drimadris stopaste/gangastong pa de ni dri ma yin te skye ba meng do// tshodang ldanopa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam gras ris na/ dri'om skyes pa gang yin pa de drom yin no// tshodang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lo ni sa stong ste/gang stobang de mirom yan ti skya ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shA snga rwa ti'i bu rnam gras res na/ ro'i me skyes pa gang yanang de ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes

'gagisaMso ste/ gang stong pa de la legam yin skye pa mang re// tshodang ldan pa sha snga du dbye rnam grangs ngesan regagi ma skyes pa gang yane pa de reg yin no// tshong ldan pa' snga dra te bu chos nitshos kyi

stong ste/ gastongapa de ni chos ma yin te skye ba med do// modang ldan pa/shar ti'abu rnam gangs des na/ chos kyi maskyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yanano// tshe dang ldanu pa shar dwa ti ribu mgo gi rnam par
shes pa nAmagag rkem par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de name geg rnamapar shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shAr du tare'i rnamagras resan/ mgo ga rnams shes

pa'i ma skyes bgangayane pade mig rnam par shes pam yin no// tshad ldan pa shar dati'abu rna 'ad+d+himapar shes pa'i rnathob rnam par shes ngas stong ste/ gangastongob de na ba'i rnam pa shes ba ne te skye ba

med do// 'od ldan dngashan du 'dre rnamagras desan/ rnab rnam par shesang lam skyes pa gangs dpang rnahAdza? rnamabab shes pa ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bayul rnamapar shes ba ni sna'i rnam/

par shesang sastolta/ gango stong pa de nasmi'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba mngado// tshodang ldan ngashu bdu ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sam+b+hanem par shes pa rim pas pa gang yin ng de sAlinem pirashes

pan yan no/ tshodang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu lce'arnyem par shes pa ni lcerI rnam par shes pas stong ste (gang stong ba de ni lce' rem par shes pa ma yin te skye ba yod do// tshodang ldan ngangashu snga dra ti'i bu

rnamagrangs ngesan/ lce'i rnam par shes paN+Dim skyes pa gang yin pa de lce 'a rnam bar shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tirobu lus kyi rnam de rnga shes pa ni lus rnam par shes pas stong ste/ grang 7

stongang de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yane skyab med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bi rnam grangs ngesan/ lus kyi rnam pa shes pa'i m skyes nga gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//

0/ tshodang ldan nganga' bdwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam pa jis nga nAyed kyi rnam par shes pa sa stong ste/ gangastongapa de nayange kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shu'adwa ta'i bu rnamagrus ngesan/

yod kyi rnam par shes pa rimaskyes pa gang yin de yang kyi rnamado 28sheb ma yin no/ tshorang ldan shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te theg pa ni mog ga'adus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mog ga 'asu

regapa ma yin te skye ba med do/tshodang ldan b ra da ti'i bu rnam graades na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yanang/ de migegi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA rarwa ti'i bu rna ba'i

'dus te reg ba no sneba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gangastongapa re ni rna ba' 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs ngesan nuba'i 'dus te reg pa'im skyes pa gang

yang de na btsu'adus te gang ma yin no// tshodang ldan pashu 'dra la sreg pa sna 'dus te reg pos stong ste/ gang stong pa denas ri'idus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i/

bu rnamagras desan/ snya'adus te reg pa'i rtse skyes pa gang yin pa da stsalo'as te 'gapa mayon no// tshongang ldan pang+ka' bar ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te regapan lce la 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa

de na lce'i dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa/ shang dra ti'abu rnam grangs nges na/ lce'a'adus te reg pa ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te rdzong ma yin no// mo dang ldan ba 'khatsA ra
bu lus kyi 'dus te reg ba ni'us kyi 'dus te reg pas stobaste/ gcungapade nilus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba mang ngo// modang ldand shu radwagyi rnam gra desan/ lus/

kyi 'dus reg pa'i skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te regab na yani'o// tshodang ldan ng[– ]radwa ti'i bre yang kyi'angs te rig pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stongaste/gangastong ba de na yod kyi 'dus te regangs

yin yibase go/ tshe dang ldan ng sha ra dwa ti'abu rnam grasadis na/yid kyi 'dus te sreg pa'i m skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rtsod ldan pa/ sha 'dwa ti'i bu mgi ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi/

gi 'angs te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te drag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// rtsod ldan pa shA 'duti'i bu bkri 'das de cig pa'i rkyen gyis tsho bani ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa derarnyeba'i'is te sreg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho bam yin te skye ba med do// nangaldan ng ba 'dra tileb rnam gral resan/ rnabali'angs te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'amaskyes pa gang yin

we ba de rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan ngashA ra dwa ti'i bu stsa' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho khamasna'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i
mag 'thusaga' rgyargyas zhabasam

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA ti'i bu rnam grangs res na/ sAlA'adus te reg pa/skyen gyis tsho ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa desala'engus te drag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bum

yin no// tshodang ldanub rarwa ti'i bu lco'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis tshor bsastong ste/ gang stong pa de na lcir 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye bamed

de dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i'i rnam gras des na/ lce la 'jus te regapa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba'i skyas pagaTayanapa de lcetsa'adus te reg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba ma yanego// tshe dang ldan dza shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus/

kyibs te regapa chen gyis tshor ba na 'u su kyi 'dus te regaba'i skyin gus bas stong ste/ garngastongang de na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yanye te slob med do/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dra de'i phyogs

rnam tharjesadesan lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yapa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bam yin mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi dus te reg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor bzhi

yud kyi 'i dus te legaba'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gango stong pa de na yade kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yan te skye ba med ngo tshe dang ldan ng bar du tun gyi rnam grangs nges na/ yadi kyi 'dug

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am skyes pa gang yanong de yang kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'abu satsakhenAn se si khomI kyis so phye/gang stongapa de ni sa'i khams mi
yin te skye bzhed do// modang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangasades na/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de su'i khoms ma yin no// tshedang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'o/

[« ]khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na chu'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam gras desan/ chu'akhems kyi mgyes pa gang yin pa de chub khamis ma yin//

tshod ldan ng lA ra dwa ti'i bu mo'i khams ni mi'i bams kyis stongasbyo/ga stongapa de ni mo'i khems ma yin te slob med do// tshodang ldan pa gang dra ti'abu rnam grangaso desan/ ma' khams kyis skyes ba gangayin pa

dayape khams ma yin no// dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams nirlungag thams kyis stoste/ grangastongapo re ni rlu gakrams ma yamu skyo ba medado/ modang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam gras des// rlung
khams kyi mgyesang gangayapa de gi khams ma yin mo/ tshodang ldan ng shuradwa ta'i bu nam mkha'i khams na nyamadzuba'akhems kyi stong sto/gangastong pa de ni nam mkha'i khams yin te skye bamed do/

dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnamagrangs nges na/nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yaning nge 'am mkha'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam shes pa'i lems nimapa shes bsu'ems kyis

stong ste/ gang steng du de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye bamed ngo// tshe dang ldan ng sha dra 'bu rnam grangs rjes// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sa skyes pa gang yanipa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/

tshe dang ldan pa shA rnga dwa ti'i bum 'gepan mu ge pas go ste/ gangastong pa de ni ma 'ge pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pojasha rngadra ti'aphye rnam grangasadeng na/mchig pa'iwe skyes pa gang yin pa de mang gi/

pa ma yin no// tshodang ldan b ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed na byed kyi stong ga gang stong pade na 'du byed ma yin te skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu rnamagrasades na/ 'du byed kyi lta skyes pa gang lan

de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pad+hAb ra dwa ti'i ba rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gangastong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin paskye ba mang ngo/tshodang ldan po sha'adwa ti'i bu rnam grasu desan/

rnam par shes pa'i sa skyes pa gangayani pa de rnamapar shes pa ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa 'a rarwa ta'i khu mang dang gzugs minged gzugs kyis stong ste/ gangastong pa de nam ri deng gzugs ma yin te slob

med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i rnam grangs desan/mnge dang gzugs kyiyesmyos pa gang yin pa de mang dang gzugasam yacheno// tshe dang ldan ng 'dra ti'i 'gyu mched drug skye mched drug gsastong ste/ gang stong

ba de nasnye mched drug ma yin te skyo ba medado// tshodang ldan ng ba 'du ti'obu rnamagras des na/ skye mched drug gam skyes pa gang yin pa de sumachad drugam yin no// tshod ldan pang gang dra te'obu reg pa na rig pas

stong sto/ gangastong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba med de// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnamagrangs/des na/ reg pa'i m skyes pa gang yin pa de rig pa ma yin no/ tsho dang ljonarangur rwa ti'i bu tshor ba

ni tsher bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de'i tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med de// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA//

ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa ni srid pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni srid pa ma yan te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA

rwa ti'i bu len pa len pas stong ste/gang stong pa du na len pa ma yin te skyo ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan

pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu srid pan srid ngas stedaste/ gang stong pa de'i srid pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des no/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin

ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba na skyo bas stong stagang stong pa de na skye ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs sa na/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba na ya zhe

tshe dang ldan par@#pa dwa ti'i bu rga shi na rga shis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi cig yane rta ste bcad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa rdo rga shi ma

yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skyo ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i

bu rnam grangs des na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'il skyes pa gang yin pa de spyon pa'i nga rol tu phyin pa ma yin ste// dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'a khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grugades na tshul khrims kyi phab la tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// mo dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyizhe pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bzod pa'i rol du phyin pa ma yin te/

skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan par shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs dris na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i yu rob tu phyin pa ma yin// mo dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu btson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pam yin te skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grang des na/ brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i m skyes pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha ro' tu phyin pa ma yin no// tsho dang ldan pa ltar dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong

ste gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi ye rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med po/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan gyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa'i lo skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni legs bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//

taskye med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnamagras des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stongs

da na nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ga nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye tha med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ nang stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma

yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa de na phye steng pa nyide kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa done pho stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid

kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// dang

ldan pahAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/

gang stong pa de na stong pa de stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pathAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ stong pa nyid stong pa de kya ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa de ma yin no// tshe dang

ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid/

kyim skyes pa gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam ba stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stod pa de ma yin

skya ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong

ba de na 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skyo ba med do// tsho dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa de kyi ma skyes pa gang

gne pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa da ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yine ta skyeb

med do/ modang ldan pa nga' dwa ti'i bu rnam gras desan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyide ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grung desan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa/[l]
nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid ni thog mdang thamu med pa stong pa nyid/

kyis stong ste// gang sbyor pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skyo ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i khu rnam grangs des zha/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa/

da thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan bshA ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te

ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ yo ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma rgyas pa gang yin pa de dor ba nad pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong ba nyid nasong

bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na reng bzhi stong pa nyid ma ya ta skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi laskyes pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin

stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yini ta skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan

paha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang

0/gumtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gangastong pa de na deng gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ de dang ldan pa'i dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid kyi ma skyes ba gang

yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yazhe na// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mo dmagos pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmagos pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma ni

te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa tA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des// ma dmagis pa stong pa nyid kyim skyes pa gang yin pa de mi dmags pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// mo dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa

stod pa nyid na dengos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste gang stong pa den dngos po med pa stong pa nyidem ba'i ta skye ba med do// tshodang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshe

skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nge ba de stong pa nyid kyi stong ste/ gang stong pa de na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidem min te skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa/

sha ra dwa ti'i bu mo grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin ba de ngo bo nyid stong ba nyidam lu ni// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyide ni dngos po med pa'i ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/

kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nya bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste//

gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa ltar dwa ti'i rnam grangs des zhu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan par dwa ti'i bu yang dag par sbyong ba rnams n yang dag par sbyong ba mas kyis stongaste/ gangastod pa don yo nga dag par sbyong ba rnams m yan te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan

pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ yang dag par sbyong ba las kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par sbyong ba rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pe rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba den rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA'adwa ti'i bu rnam

klas dosan/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bustobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stobs rnams m yin te skye ba med do/

katsho dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan laga rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis

stong ste gang stong pa de na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi na lag
rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags pa'i 'am yun lag brgyud pas stong ste/ gang stong pa don 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin tu

skyo ba med do// tshe dang ldan papat+tA ra dwa ti'obu rnam grangs des// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dwa ti'i bu

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med po// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs desan/ 'phags

ba'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yazhe'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan

rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yazheno// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshad med pa

rnams n tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gangastong pa de na tshod med pa rnams m na te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i khu rnamagras desan/ tshad med ba rnams kyi ma smyos pa gang//

yazhe pa de tshad med pa rnams ma bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i snyomasabar 'jug ba rnams na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug b rnams kyisastong ste/ gang stong pa de na gzugs med pagi/

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yazhe pa de gzugs med pa'i snyems bar 'dug

pa rnams ma lanan// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam bar thar pa rnams na rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de na rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
grangs desan/ rnam par thab bams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam bar thar pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyi gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas kyis stong ste/ gang stongapa den mthar gyis gzhus pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma gzhi teskye bamed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mthar gyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gong yan pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang/
